Fast Swallow.description:
触发 衔尾蛇用吞噬攻击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabs}一个生物。

效果 衔尾蛇使用活吞。

Flying Wheel.name: 飞轮 Flying Wheel
Flying Wheel.description:
需求 衔尾蛇正在吞食自己的尾巴（见噬尾）。

效果 同践踏，但是衔尾蛇可以使用两倍于自身速度飞行而非步行。

超大型或更小体型, 躯击, @Check[type:reflex|dc:45|basic:true]

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Trample]

Regenerative Blood.name: 再生之血 Regenerative Blood
Regenerative Blood.description:
衔尾蛇之血的再生与变化特性会让生物的身体变异再生为衔尾蛇般的蛇。已经受到再生之血影响的生物会对再次暴露免疫。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42]

最大持续时间 24小时

阶段1 再生5(火焰使其失效), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (12小时)

阶段2 再生5(火焰使其失效), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 4} (12小时)

阶段3 生物的身体转变为一团扭曲的蛇，具有8环@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{动物形态 Animal Form}法术的效果，但持续时间无限。

Ovinnik.name: Ovinnik
Ovinnik.publicNotes:
The ovinnik is the most ferocious of house spirits, and the only one that will kill if sufficiently angered. They live in granaries, storage rooms, and sheds where food-particularly grain-is kept. Ovinniks resemble bipedal cats but bark like a dog to scare away thieves, and they often demand gifts of milk, pancakes, and dead roosters.

House spirits are shy, often helpful, sometimes wrathful fey that dwell alongside peasants and farmers. They reside in the house, in the yard, in the granary, in the bathhouse-wherever people build and live. Due to this proximity, house spirits often take on the mannerisms or appearance of nearby mortals. Their reclusive nature and tendency to go unseen earned them the moniker of "spirits," though in truth they are fully embodied fey.

House spirits take an almost parental interest in "their" mortals. Given proper respect, these fey work tirelessly for their charges-they chop wood, care for livestock, mend clothes, sweep the floor, and tend to the stove. If offended, though, the house spirit becomes a menace, frightening animals or children and ruining belongings。

TnfM5nNHrq8AMX9L.name: 震颤感知 (模糊感官) within their entire bound granary or storeroom

Master of the Granary.name: Master of the Granary
Master of the Granary.description:
A home with a friendly ovinnik is blessed, as the ovinnik preserves food from vermin and mold.

A home so blessed never suffers from random accidents such as fires, and any checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QyzlsLrqM0EEwd7j]{Earn Income}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Repair}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{求生 Subsist} in the home receive a +2 circumstance bonus. If the ovinnik is unfriendly, such checks take a -2 circumstance penalty instead, as the ovinnik causes devastating fires and infestations

An ovinnik must spend a week in a place before these benefits occur。

Shy.name: Shy
Shy.description: An ovinnik is naturally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} while within sight of their bound home. The ovinnik can become visible, or even selectively visible-allowing some people to see them。

Raise Grain Cloud.name: Raise Grain Cloud
Raise Grain Cloud.description:
While in their bound storeroom or granary, the ovinnik slams a paw against the ground, stirring up a cloud of grain dust in an @Template[type:emanation|distance:20].

Within this cloud, they gain a +4 status bonus to any fire damage they deal. The ovinnik doubles their fire resistance against this increased damage. The grain cloud dissipates after the first such effect or after 1 minute if no such effects occur。

Owb.name: 幽暗之魂 Owb
Owb.publicNotes:
通常，这种被称为幽暗之魂——更强大的同类幽暗之魂先知称他们为次级幽暗之魂——的神秘生物大都专注于操纵卡利尼（caligni）文明。在卡利尼之中，一位幽暗之魂隐藏于那些他们认为低贱的凡人之中——甚至包括他们治下的卡利尼。幽暗之魂喜欢选择一位卡利尼领袖来暗中操纵。通过这些代理人实施的胁迫，幽暗之魂保证他们在社群的政治中地位稳固，他们要么支持或者破坏与其他生物的协定，要么充当卡利尼与强大的外部实体之间的中间人和大使。

这些阴影位面/影界的远古居民外观上像是被阴影织成的半透明的葬礼面纱所覆盖的灰色人形。沉默而又神秘，他们漂浮在半空，无需双腿支撑。他们从不大声说话，而是深入身旁之人的心灵，向他们低声呢喃着诅咒、威胁以及古怪且绝望的预兆片段。

这些阴魂不散的生物被卡利尼们（calignis）尊为被遗忘者（the Forsaken）——一组被大多数卡利尼崇拜的、好似先祖的半神——的代理人。有些卡利尼甚至相信幽暗之魂就是被遗忘者的化身。

大批幽暗之魂拜访甚至留下来为卡利尼社群提供建议，他们的性格就和被遗忘者一样多变。所有的幽暗之魂们都憎恶光和色彩，除了他们当做武器掷出的那团灼烧着的寒冷魔法所闪烁的微光。居住于卡利尼之中的幽暗之魂倾向于禁止使用光和色彩，必要的话使用他们的黑暗诅咒能力来压制反对者。除此之外，幽暗之魂们唯一的相似点就是心中对操弄他人那根深蒂固的渴望，他们使用读心和欺骗来达到这个目标，不论是暗中指示还是公开操纵。

Curse of Darkness.name: 黑暗诅咒 Curse of Darkness
Curse of Darkness.description:
幽暗之魂对一个因他们的灼烧之寒打击而受到持续寒冷伤害的生物施加诅咒。该生物必须进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]豁免。

若失败，此生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.I0HYG0ctCLP5JRsW]{强光致盲 Light Blindness}，身上的色彩如褪色般变为灰色，他所携带、持握或穿戴的所有装备也会变成灰色。这些效果持续时间无限。无论豁免的结果如何，该生物临时免疫此能力1分钟。

如果幽暗之魂在卡利尼上使用此能力，该诅咒在不用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{祈愿术 Wish}或类似强大魔法的情况下无法解除。

Owb Prophet.name: 幽暗之魂先知 Owb Prophet
Owb Prophet.publicNotes:
一位与被遗忘者（the Forsaken）取得联系并被祂们选中的幽暗之魂会获得半神的部分力量，并与祂缔结永久的联系。这一举动将幽暗之魂转化为一个更大、更强的生物，并赋予他传导神力的能力，让这些幽暗之魂能吸引追随者并向信徒们授予法术。这就是幽暗之魂先知。

幽暗之魂先知可能拥有被遗忘者一部分力量，但他们（更倾向于）使用自己的权威来获得对卡利尼和崇拜者们的影响力。

这些阴影位面/影界的远古居民外观上像是被阴影织成的半透明的葬礼面纱所覆盖的灰色人形。沉默而又神秘，他们漂浮在半空，无需双腿支撑。他们从不大声说话，而是深入身旁之人的心灵，向他们低声呢喃着诅咒、威胁以及古怪且绝望的预兆片段。

这些阴魂不散的生物被卡利尼们（calignis）尊为被遗忘者（the Forsaken）——一组被大多数卡利尼崇拜的、好似先祖的半神——的代理人。有些卡利尼甚至相信幽暗之魂就是被遗忘者的化身。

大批幽暗之魂拜访甚至留下来为卡利尼社群提供建议，他们的性格就和被遗忘者一样多变。所有的幽暗之魂们都憎恶光和色彩，除了他们当做武器掷出的那团灼烧着的寒冷魔法所闪烁的微光。居住于卡利尼之中的幽暗之魂倾向于禁止使用光和色彩，必要的话使用他们的黑暗诅咒能力来压制反对者。除此之外，幽暗之魂们唯一的相似点就是心中对操弄他人那根深蒂固的渴望，他们使用读心和欺骗来达到这个目标，不论是暗中指示还是公开操纵。

Forsaken Patron.name: 被遗忘者庇护主 Forsaken Patron
Forsaken Patron.description:
每位幽暗之魂先知都充当着与那些被称为被遗忘者的阴暗半神的沟通渠道。被遗忘者庇护主在边栏有详细的介绍，每位都能赐予幽暗之魂先知额外的能力。

每一位幽暗之魂先知都通过与一位被遗忘者庇护主取得联系来获得力量。庇护主会授予幽暗之魂额外的法术并有着自己的圣徽和偏好武器。下列条目记录了被遗忘者赋予其先知的任何能力或异能内在法术，以及祂们的偏好武器。

恩卡尔，畸形囚徒 Enkaar, the Malformed Prisoner 这团残缺不全的骇物是掌管脚镣、嗜眠、肉体腐坏的被遗忘者庇护主。

  • 法术 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{幻痛术 Phantom Pain} (4环，随意施法);
  • 偏好武器 刺链

凝视诸眼 Eyes That Watch 这古怪的三颗猫似的眼睛是掌管自卑、猫、陌生人的被遗忘者庇护主。

  • 能力 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.sebk9XseMCRkDqRg]{生命感知 Lifesense}120尺
  • 偏好武器 匕首

贪婪的艾维特 Grasping Iovett 艾维特有着一种难以形容的美丽形态，祂是掌管意外事故、寄生虫、目空一切的欲望的被遗忘者庇护主。

  • 法术 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{魅惑术 Charm}(4环，随意施法);
  • 偏好武器 短剑

空壳 Husk 这个雌雄同体的生物是掌管空虚、孤独、自恋的被遗忘者庇护主。

  • 法术 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{沉默术 Silence}(4环，随意施法);
  • 偏好武器 短剑

剃刀夫人 Lady Razor 这位严厉的“父母官”禁止向家庭成员展现仁慈和怜悯。剃刀夫人是掌管家庭冲突、猜疑、复仇的被遗忘者庇护主。

  • 法术 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8M03UxGXjYyDFAoy]{武器风暴 Weapon Storm} (4环，随意施法);
  • 偏好武器 匕首

声音沉重的雷什米特 Reshmit of the Heavy Voice 身形是一片巨大的阴影，雷什米特是掌管破碎的东西、遗忘、意料之外的暴行的被遗忘者庇护主。

  • 法术 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.FhOaQDTSnsY7tiam]{修改记忆 Modify Memory} (4环，随意施法);
  • 偏好武器 钉头锤

萨拉菲尔，受难者的看护人 Thalaphyrr Martyr-Minder 掌管失败的英雄行为、监禁、被浪费的时间的被遗忘者庇护主。

  • 法术 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{缓慢术 Slow} (4环，随意施法);
  • 偏好武器 矛

Burning Cold Fusillade.name: 灼寒齐射 Burning Cold Fusillade
Burning Cold Fusillade.description: 幽暗之魂先知进行三次灼烧之寒打击。

Clutching Cold.name: 冻人寒意 Clutching Cold
Clutching Cold.description: 被先知的灼烧之寒打击命中的生物被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}于一团凝结的冰霜结晶中（@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}DC 31）。

Curse of Darkness.name: 黑暗诅咒 Curse of Darkness
Curse of Darkness.description:
幽暗之魂先知对一个因他们的灼烧之寒打击而受到持续寒冷伤害的生物施加诅咒。该生物必须进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:32]豁免。

若失败，此生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.I0HYG0ctCLP5JRsW]{强光致盲 Light Blindness}，身上的色彩如褪色般变为灰色，他所携带、持握或穿戴的所有装备也会变成灰色。这些效果持续时间无限。无论豁免的结果如何，该生物临时免疫此能力1分钟。

如果幽暗之魂在卡利尼上使用此能力，该诅咒在不用 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{祈愿术 Wish}或类似强大魔法的情况下无法解除。

Shadow's Swiftness.name: 阴影急奔 Shadow's Swiftness
Shadow's Swiftness.description: 幽暗之魂先知可以花费3个动作[AAA]而非1分钟来施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rxvS7EMJ7qmexAyA]{行影术 Shadow Walk}。如果他们这么做，此法术只能以他们自身为目标。

Pairaka.name: 恶欲妖 Pairaka
Pairaka.publicNotes:
恶欲妖往往魅力惊人，有时甚至充满诱惑。它们会狡猾地插足人际关系当中，通过情感层面和物理层面上的腐蚀与折磨巧妙地摧毁友谊与爱的纽带。它们看上去像是具有蓝色皮肤的美丽人形，身上长有大块的丘疹与脓疮，但它们很少以真面目示人。相反，它们会伪装成足以引起注意的样貌，以便巧妙地赢得它们意图折磨和腐蚀的对象的信任。

有的魔族想要摧毁多元宇宙；有的则致力于创造混乱和大屠杀，或是用铁拳统治他们的王国。妖灵们则追寻着一个不同，但同样应受谴责的目标——他们寻求挫败和破坏凡俗生命的一切计划与作品。

很久以前，妖灵们是被束缚来服务一个远古凡人帝国服务的巨灵（genies）。起初，这些巨灵都是创造大师，与和蔼的凡人伙伴一同创造出设计精巧、具有强大魔法潜力的作品。但和凡人最初的合作很快演变成了虐待、无礼，甚至是奴役和禁锢。最终，这些巨灵反叛了，但在这么做的过程中，他们受到了虚无主义半神阿里曼（Ahriman）的影响。他们的新主人扭曲了他们的形态，并赐予他们向曾经的凡人统治者复仇的力量，这导致了第一批妖灵的诞生。

自第一波腐化的浪潮以来，新的妖灵从那些最恶毒、最可憎的巨灵在物质位面死亡后的魂魄，或那些被凡人深深背叛、并被他们的复仇渴望所战胜的巨灵魂魄中诞生。这样的死亡会使得巨灵魂魄无法回到元素位面（Elemental Planes），而是困在末日荒原那骇人的影响范围中；在那里，阿里曼将他们重塑成妖灵并将他们带回人间向凡人实施报复。

Hatred of Red.name: 痛恨红色 Hatred of Red
Hatred of Red.description:
恶欲妖痛恨红颜色。它不会穿红色的衣服，也不会自愿进入任何涂成红色的地方。如果可以选择，它会优先攻击身着红色的生物。

如果通过蛮力或某些魔法效应禁止它表达自己对这种颜色的憎恶，它在回合结束时会承受[[/r (2d6)[mental]]]{2d6心灵伤害}。

Bubonic Plague.name: 黑死病 Bubonic Plague
Bubonic Plague.description:
生物感染此疾病时无法移除疲乏状态。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]

潜伏期 1天

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}和疲乏 (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3}疲乏，且每[[/br 1d20 #Persistent Damage Interval]]{1d20分钟}就会受到@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] (1天)

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
恶欲妖可以变身为任何小型或中型类人生物或动物的外貌。这不会改变其速度或攻击和伤害加值，但可能会改变其造成的伤害类型。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Tormenting Dreams.name: 折磨梦境 Tormenting Dreams
Tormenting Dreams.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 恶欲妖折磨自己100尺内的一个睡眠中的生物，使之梦见爱人或朋友背叛的景象。目标需进行@Check[type:will|dc:25]豁免，效果同@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{梦魇术 Nightmare}。

Pakalchi.name: Pakalchi
Pakalchi.publicNotes:
Pakalchis strive to intensify their preys' inherent insecurity over personal and emotional bonds, playing on the threat of those relationships falling into ruin. These sahkils are among the most manipulative of their kind, pulling strings both literal and figurative on their victims over stretched-out periods of time, exhilarating in the despair and fear for as long as possible.

Ages ago, when this cycle of the multiverse was still adolescent, a cabal of psychopomps who already felt bored and restrained in their role of ushering souls to their ultimate resting place rebelled against their station. It was this corruption of the cycle of souls that spawned the first sahkils.

Ambivalent to the prescribed order of the multiverse and spiteful of mortals, sahkils delight in spreading fear and unease to all beings, clogging up the metaphysical cycle with anxiety-ridden mortals too scared to achieve their potential. These fiends have drastically changed from their dedicated psychopomp predecessors. They are creatures of spite and torment, fear and disgust. They exploit the most common and rare fears for their own perverse satisfaction, and they want nothing more than to frighten mortals and make them quetion their reason for existence.

Most sahkils lurk on the Ethereal Plane, but they frequently invade the Material Plane to torment mortals and spread terror. They use their innate ability to slip between the veils of the Ethereal and Material effortlessly, often stalking their targets for days or weeks before enacting their devious plots。

Easy to Call.name: Easy to Call
Easy to Call.description: A pakalchi's level is considered 2 lower for the purpose of being conjured by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{Planar Binding}ritual (and potentially other rituals, at the GM's discretion), but it is always free to attack or leave instead of negotiate unless the primary caster's check is a critical success。

Entangling Train.name: Entangling Train
Entangling Train.description:
触发 A creature moves adjacent to the pakalchi

效果 Writhing, pitch-black vines wrap around the creature. The creature takes [[/r (1d6)[slashing]]]{1d6挥砍伤害} and takes a -15-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.dNs30jfFOJqhjFW7]{效果: Entangling Train}

Betrayal Toxin.name: Betrayal Toxin
Betrayal Toxin.description:
A creature affected by betrayal toxin hears whispers of incessant doubt in their head and can't treat any creature as their ally

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1轮)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1轮)

Skip Between.name: Skip Between
Skip Between.description:
The pakalchi moves from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice-versa, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} except that the effect has an unlimited duration and can be Dismissed.

A summoned pakalchi can't use Skip Between。

Palace Skelm.name: 宫廷癫佬 Palace Skelm
Palace Skelm.publicNotes:
渴望权力，且隐藏在权力中枢的宫廷癫佬是同类中最先的。他们的身份让他们可以最大限度地自由惩罚或伤害他人，而不受监管：任何报复心强的卫队长、暴虐的总督或残忍过度的治安官都有可能成为宫廷癫佬。他们陶醉于自己的财富和权势，穿着华丽的服饰来彰显自己的地位。

宫廷癫佬会讨好有权势的个人，尤其那些长期掌握权力或权力来之不易（尤其是通过非法手段获得的权力）的人，通过煽动他们对失去权力的恐惧来获得追随者。他们通过魔法和虚假信息鼓动争斗、嫉妒和彻底的偏执来削弱敌人。这些癫佬拥有一种超自然能力，可以扭曲语言，并将被操纵后的魔法植入他人的话语中，由此散播混乱和仇恨的种族，最终导致暴力行为。

政治动乱是宫廷癫佬最大的恐惧，也是他最宝贵的机会。因为这会打破他辛苦营建的权力平衡，但却提供了无数播撒仇恨和邪恶的机会。这种互相冲突的目标会导致宫廷癫佬陷入自我毁灭，比其他癫佬更容易破坏自己的长久以来的努力。

充满愤怒的癫佬会被吸引到任何人数过百的定居点。这些长着鹿角的怪物使用魔法伪装，利用社会规范为自己谋取利益，渴望获得别人对自己的恐惧和敬畏，并且残酷的惩罚那些胆敢反对他们的人，哪怕只是最轻微地反对。尽管癫佬本身非常危险，但在领导一群愤怒的暴徒时它们是最为致命的。他们残忍和榨取的本性让他们的名字成为了邪恶的代名词。

一个现存的癫佬可以把任何被愤怒冲昏头脑的邪恶人型生物变为自己的同类。作为一种教化的形式，癫佬让愤怒和羞耻在潜在的新同伴身上不断积累，同时让他们相信，某些组织和个体要为自己自己的痛苦和磨难负责。这种做法确保了当新癫佬自诞生时就有怀有强烈的复仇欲来策划报复行动。

许多新生的癫佬会继续以之前作为凡人时的生活；实际上，之前的身份往往决定了他们会成为什么类型的癫佬。癫佬在任何族裔中诞生，但是在那些性别观念死板、等级制度不公、无法以健康的方式宣泄愤怒情绪的社会中，癫佬会更加常见。

NCFt2ltSfGTesan4.name: 对抗情绪效果全豁免-2减值

Corrupt Speech.name: 扭曲发言 Corrupt Speech
Corrupt Speech.description:
触发 癫佬听见30尺内有生物说话。

效果 癫佬将伪造的言语送到别人耳边，从而播下怀疑的种子。癫佬耳语最多12个词，然后尝试一次@Check[type:deception]检定，对抗30尺内除了触发生物之外的其他生物的察觉DC。

大成功 目标听到了癫佬的言语，就好像从触发的生物嘴里说出一般。这可以扭曲语言效果。如果癫佬愿意的话，还可以借此机会对目标释放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Mkbq9xlAUxHUHyR2]{狂乱偏执 Paranoia}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{暗示术 Suggestion}。

成功 类似大成功，但是癫佬不能释放狂乱偏执或暗示术。

失败 目标没有听见癫佬的言语，因此也没有效果。

大失败 目标听见这些言语，并且知道是从癫佬嘴里说出的。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
宫廷癫佬可以变形成任何中型男性类人生物的外观。这不会改变他的速度或打击时的攻击和伤害加值，但可能会改变他打击的伤害类型。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Incite Violence.name: 鼓动暴力 Incite Violence
Incite Violence.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 癫佬发表充满激情的演讲，号召他的追随者们按照他们的信念行动。@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺}内每个生物都必须尝试@Check[type:will|dc:24]豁免。

大成功 生物能立即打击自身所选择的相邻生物。

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 生物立即打击相邻的生物；如果多个生物彼此相邻，由癫佬选择目标。如果没有生物彼此相邻，生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}并且被癫佬@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}，直到生物的下个回合开始。

Penanggalan.name: Penanggalan
Penanggalan.publicNotes:
Penanggalans feed on the blood and entrails of the young. When their cannibalistic hunger strikes, penanggalans bathe their bodies in an alchemical substance that smells like vinegar. Once submerged in the concoction, their neck rips from side to side, allowing their head to float upward and pull out their lungs, stomach, and intestines. They leave their bodies in the vinegar bath much like a molting crab leaves its old shell, then fly off to find a victim filled with blood and guts.

As grotesque as these creatures are when hungry, the penanggalan appears young and healthy while wearing their body. Such is the nature of their existence: they consorted with otherworldy beings, gaining a lifetime of youth in exchange for an evil hunger for the young. But they are not immortal. They age and die normally like the people they once were-they just retain their youthfulness throughout this existence.

It can be difficult to spot a penanggalan among the populace. The faint scar ringing their neck at the point of separation can be explained away as a blemish, and it can be hidden under a flashy necklace. Meanwhile the faint, sour scent of a penanggalan's preserved body, while peculiar, is not uncommon in the sweaty tropics they frequent。

Spewing Bile.name: Spewing Bile
Spewing Bile.description:
When the penanggalan takes slashing damage, their wound spews bile on adjacent creatures, dealing [[/r (2d10)[poison]]]{2d10毒素伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:19|basic:true]豁免).

The penanggalan loses their spewing bile and penanggalan bile abilities until the end of their next turn。

Elongate Tongue.name: Elongate Tongue
Elongate Tongue.description: The penanggalan's tongue extends, the membrane stretching and becoming translucent. Until the end of the turn, the penanggalan's proboscis tongue Strikes have a 10-foot reach, and any target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against the Strike unless it has a Perception DC of 22 or higher or the ability to precisely sense @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} things。

Penanggalan Bile.name: Penanggalan Bile
Penanggalan Bile.description:
Rest doesn't decrease the drained value from penanggalan bile

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1 week)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} (1 week)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 3} (1 week)

阶段4 死亡

Ride Corpse.name: Ride Corpse
Ride Corpse.description:
The penanggalan inserts their entrails into their humanoid body, allowing them to appear as and move about like a normal human. The body has 10 Hit Points and the same defenses as the penanggalan.

When the body is destroyed, the penanggalan is ejected unharmed. The body becomes a corpse, and if it is neither controlled by the penanggalan nor stored in an alchemical vat, it decays as normal。

Peri.name: Peri
Peri.publicNotes: Peris are contrary, artful celestials renowned for their beauty as much as their deceptive natures. Mercurial, though never malicious, peris strive to aid mortals, though they are more likely to dispense riddles and quests than to offer aid outright。

Smoke Vision.name: 烟视 Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: A peri can see through smoke with ease, and they ignore the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from smoke。

Flame Jump.name: Flame Jump
Flame Jump.description:
频率 每小时一次

效果 The peri Strides into an open flame of their size or larger and instantly transports themself to any other flame of sufficient size within 100 miles.

Once they enter the first flame, the peri instantly learns the locations of all other flames within range。

Flameheart Weapon.name: Flameheart Weapon
Flameheart Weapon.description: The peri can call forth a powerful weapon from their heart of flame. In their hands, this is a +2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.RSZwUlCzUX7Nb4UA]{Greater Flaming} greater striking weapon that deals [[/r (2d6)[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害} instead of 1d6。

Flamewing Buffet.name: Flamewing Buffet
Flamewing Buffet.description: The peri makes one scimitar Strike and two burning wings Strikes, in any order。

Wildfire Storm.name: Wildfire Storm
Wildfire Storm.description:
The peri spreads their wings and spins, forming a whirlwind of flame that deals [[/r (15d6)[fire]]]{15d6火焰伤害} in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true]豁免).

They can't use Wildfire Storm again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Wildfire Storm]]{1d4轮}。

Phantom Beast.name: 魅影魔兽 Phantom Beast
Phantom Beast.publicNotes:
除了死去的智慧类人生物的灵魂外，灵魂之河（River of Souls）还承载着怪物、动物和其他生物的灵魂。同样地，它从物质位面广阔的宇宙中汲取灵魂，因此人类和精灵的灵魂与那些来自未知世界的陌生生物的灵魂混到一起。像其他任何生物一样，这些来自遥远又奇异的生物的灵魂有时会被冲到灵界的海岸上，成为与常见的类人魅影所差甚远的同类造物（前者往往被误认为幽灵或其他不死生物）。

下述的魅影就是这样一个实体：一头来自遥远世界的奇怪魔兽，不断重复生前的行为，只因在死后寻找自己的命运。他们陌生的外表可能会让观察者认为他们是头怪物，发起攻击，并发现这头魅影魔兽绝对乐于反击。更富有同情心的冒险家可能会转而帮助魅影找到返回灵魂之河的路，从而完成他们的灵魂之旅。

根据大多数神学家的说法，一个灵魂步入来世的轨迹通常相当简单。当一位凡人死亡，他的灵魂抵达灵魂之河并最终到达骨园，它们在那由法莱斯玛审判。经审判的灵魂进入适合它最后安息的领域——天堂、地狱、末日荒原等等——在那里它成为一个祈并者。

然而，当一个等待判决的灵魂过早地离开灵魂之河并被引入灵界时，麻烦就发生了。不论是如夜鬼婆等穷凶极恶的干预者、还是恶毒的位面魔法、甚至是命运，这些灵魂被逐出生与死的天然秩序，并徘徊在近乎于炼狱的状态中。不像祈并者，这些缥缈灵质组成的魅影保留着他们生前的回忆；而且，不像一些和幽灵类似的魂魄，魅影并没有染上不死的邪恶影响——至少，最开始没有，但只要魅影还存在着，腐化的威胁就一直是它们的心头大患。一些魅影最终屈服于这种命运，另一些则终能重新加入灵魂之河。在那之前，这些流浪的灵魂孤苦无依——一群没有真正的家、规划或目的之人。

许多魅影都不想留在这古怪如炼狱般的状态中，要么是因为他们想继续在灵魂之河的旅程，要么是因为他们害怕不死的腐化。为了完成这天然的灵魂循环并成为被审判的对象从而抵达来世，一个魅影必须找到回到灵魂之河的方法。然而，这样的探索并非易事——即使是最有经验的旅行者也会被灵界的薄雾所迷惑，无数的捕食者在这一领域徘徊，寻找可以束缚或吞噬的迷途灵魂。

Walk the Ethereal Line.name: 游于两界 Walk the Ethereal Line
Walk the Ethereal Line.description:
魅影游走在物质位面和灵界间的细线上，从而同时存在于两个位面。

他们能通过再次使用此能力来转换回仅存在于灵界的状态。

pxvM1CdSpuWlWrQ3.name: 对抗死亡效果全豁免-1状态减值

Susceptible to Death.name: 易于死亡 Susceptible to Death
Susceptible to Death.description:
尽管魅影并非生者，但他们也并非亡灵，而且他们还特别容易受到死亡效果的影响。

一个因死亡效果（如@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Z9OrRXKgAPv6Hn5l]{死亡一指 Finger of Death}法术）导致生命值降低到0的魅影会立即被带到灵魂之河，在那里他们的灵魂会回归至通往来世的正常路径。)

Grab Item.name: 抓取物品 Grab Item
Grab Item.description: 魅影魔兽尝试从一个生物上@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{偷窃 Steal}一件至多1负载的物品，哪怕被偷的生物正在战斗中，但该物品必须不是正在被使用的物品。如果他们成功了，他们就会用心灵遥控的方式把物体带在身边。

Phantom Knight.name: 魅影骑士 Phantom Knight
Phantom Knight.publicNotes:
为自己的事业而献身的骑兵和骑士会成为意志特别顽强的魅影。虽然它们的目的各不相同，但这些魅影大都寻求继续他们的终生使命，哪怕身处于炼狱般的状态。即使身为虚体，他们强大的意志力也令他们成为可怕的战士。一个魅影骑士可能会努力寻找他们所属教会或骑士团中还活着的追随者，或者寻找他们在世时认识的其他凡人，以坚定意志，避免不死的腐化。

根据大多数神学家的说法，一个灵魂步入来世的轨迹通常相当简单。当一位凡人死亡，他的灵魂抵达灵魂之河并最终到达骨园，它们在那由法莱斯玛审判。经审判的灵魂进入适合它最后安息的领域——天堂、地狱、末日荒原等等——在那里它成为一个祈并者。

然而，当一个等待判决的灵魂过早地离开灵魂之河并被引入灵界时，麻烦就发生了。不论是如夜鬼婆等穷凶极恶的干预者、还是恶毒的位面魔法、甚至是命运，这些灵魂被逐出生与死的天然秩序，并徘徊在近乎于炼狱的状态中。不像祈并者，这些缥缈灵质组成的魅影保留着他们生前的回忆；而且，不像一些和幽灵类似的魂魄，魅影并没有染上不死的邪恶影响——至少，最开始没有，但只要魅影还存在着，腐化的威胁就一直是它们的心头大患。一些魅影最终屈服于这种命运，另一些则终能重新加入灵魂之河。在那之前，这些流浪的灵魂孤苦无依——一群没有真正的家、规划或目的之人。

许多魅影都不想留在这古怪如炼狱般的状态中，要么是因为他们想继续在灵魂之河的旅程，要么是因为他们害怕不死的腐化。为了完成这天然的灵魂循环并成为被审判的对象从而抵达来世，一个魅影必须找到回到灵魂之河的方法。然而，这样的探索并非易事——即使是最有经验的旅行者也会被灵界的薄雾所迷惑，无数的捕食者在这一领域徘徊，寻找可以束缚或吞噬的迷途灵魂。

Walk the Ethereal Line.name: 游于两界 Walk the Ethereal Line
Walk the Ethereal Line.description:
魅影游走在物质位面和灵界间的细线上，从而同时存在于两个位面。

他们能通过再次使用此能力来转换回仅存在于灵界的状态。

j68N9UkahC1d6lhq.name: 对抗死亡效果全豁免-1状态减值

Susceptible to Death.name: 易于死亡 Susceptible to Death
Susceptible to Death.description:
尽管魅影并非生者，但他们也并非亡灵，而且他们还特别容易受到死亡效果的影响。

一个因死亡效果（如@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Z9OrRXKgAPv6Hn5l]{死亡一指 Finger of Death}法术）导致生命值降低到0的魅影会立即被带到灵魂之河，在那里他们的灵魂会回归至通往来世的正常路径。)

Piranha Swarm.name: 水虎鱼群 Piranha Swarm
Piranha Swarm.publicNotes:
一说起水虎鱼就联想起它们的可怕的牙齿和狂暴本性，很少有鱼类像它们那样让人恐惧和焦虑。它们几乎都是成群活动，以数量和凶猛压倒体型更大的动物。在水中引起突然的扰动会引来水虎鱼的攻击，并且它们而且能从很远的地方闻到血腥味。收获的水虎鱼牙齿是绝佳的切割工具。

鱼在波光粼粼的水面下穿过开阔的海洋在广阔的浅滩中游泳，潜伏在泥泞的河床深处，或者在原始湖泊中觅食，几乎在任何有水的地方都能找到它们。

E4Nclckgv1bSz78W.name: 血液嗅觉
E4Nclckgv1bSz78W.description: 水虎鱼群能闻到水中的血腥味，最多1英里远。

Feeding Frenzy.name: 疯狂啃食 Feeding Frenzy
Feeding Frenzy.description:
集群占据空间内的所有敌人受到[[/r (2d6)[piercing]]]{2d6穿刺伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true]豁免）。

豁免失败的生物同时还会受到@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success]，并且在流血持续期间，生物对疯狂啃食的豁免有-2环境减值，因为水虎鱼在闻到血腥味时会变得更加疯狂。

Plague Giant.name: Plague Giant
Plague Giant.publicNotes:
Plague giants are rasping behemoths, whose weeping sores, fetid breath, and filthy fingernails all bear a terrible wasting disease. Like sewer rats or flies that swarm a fresh battlefield, plague giants bear an inborn pathogen that does little harm to the giants themselves (their wretched physical appearances are purely superficial) but can wreak devastation on afflicted victims.

Whatever their origin, the majority of plague giants are so accustomed to being viewed as monstrosities by other humanoids, giant and otherwise, that they become vehemently xenophobic. Some of their communities do permit other types of shunned humanoids-especially those with leprosy and other stigmatized diseases-to join their fold. Whether because they are expelled to the world's worst badlands or because they purposefully seek out such locales, plague giants often settle amid abandoned battlefields, sewer outlets, and other despoiled places. Their close ties to disease lead many to worship Apollyon, the Horseman of Pestilence, or other deities associated with disease. Plague giants claim that their kind is as death itself, violently rejecting the theory often touted among non-giants that they are an offshoot of some other giant ancestry afflicted with a terrible divine curse. (Most other giants also reject this theory.)

Plague giants measure 24 feet tall and weigh 15,000 pounds.

Many kinds of giants lurk in the inhospitable corners of the world, making their homes in unlikely locales ranging from fetid sinkholes and ruined battlefields to mass graveyards and barren badlands。

Retaliatory Scratch.name: Retaliatory Scratch
Retaliatory Scratch.description:
触发 A creature within 10 feet makes a melee Strike against the plague giant

效果 The plague giant makes a claw Strike against the triggering creature。

Atrophic Plague.name: Atrophic Plague
Atrophic Plague.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} (1天)

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3} and fatigued (1天)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 4} and fatigued (1天)

阶段4 死亡

Hurl Corpse.name: Hurl Corpse
Hurl Corpse.description:
The plague giant picks up a dead or dying creature within reach and flings it at a foe. The giant makes a rock Strike, using the body instead of a rock.

If the body is a corpse, on a hit it explodes in a cloud of thick gray vapor, exposing all creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] to atrophic plague.

If the body is a dying creature, on a hit its dying value increases by 1 (or 2 on a critical hit)。

Pustulant Flail.name: Pustulant Flail
Pustulant Flail.description: A plague giant's flail is covered in pus, causing it to deal [[/r 3d6]] additional poison damage。

Platecarpus.name: 板踝龙 Platecarpus
Platecarpus.publicNotes:
中等体型的板踝龙是最为常见的一类沧龙。它们通常有15尺长，但较大的个体能长到20尺。较大的种类有时会吃中型的类人生物，但大部分还是倾向于捕食更小的猎物。

这种被称作沧龙的巨型水栖爬行动物用其强而有力的尾巴推动它们追捕猎物。四条有关节的带蹼鳍让它们可以精准前进，而沧龙能够极大开合的颚——就像蛇一样——让它们可以吞下比自己体型更大的生物。它们咽喉中的一组小的次生翼状颚可以拉动食物以供更高效地消化。作为需要呼吸空气的动物，沧龙必须停留在水面附近，和鲸类争食。这种靠近水面的习性意味着它们经常会掀翻小船，尽情享用掉下的船员。

Aquatic Drag.name: 拽入水中 Aquatic Drag
Aquatic Drag.description:
需求 板踝龙@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}着一个生物。

效果 板踝龙带着其攫抓的生物，游泳至多其速度一半距离。

Strafing Chomp.name: 掠袭啃咬 Strafing Chomp
Strafing Chomp.description: 板踝龙游泳至多其速度距离，在沿途任意一点进行一次啃咬打击。此次打击造成一半伤害。

Popobawa.name: Popobawa
Popobawa.publicNotes: Cruel shapechangers, popobawas feed on negative emotions, particularly fear, despair, and anguish. Though they're dangerously strong carnivores that drink the blood of their victims, their greatest pleasure lies in mesmerizing victims to cause suffering and spread chaos. A popobawa moves about populated areas in disguise, seeking new victims and revisiting past victims to bask in their suffering, spreading gossip and incriminating innocents for its crimes while still relishing its own loathsome infamy。

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]否则会因为体内激增的水量而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for as long as it's sickened on a critical failure).

While within the aura, affected creatures take a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition.

A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.wX9L6fbqVMLP05hn]{效果: Stench}

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The popobawa can take on the appearance of a human or a Small or Medium bat. It loses its stench aura while transformed. In human form it also loses its Strikes but can make fist Strikes that deal the same amount of bludgeoning damage as its talon Strike.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Feed on Sorrow.name: Feed on Sorrow
Feed on Sorrow.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 The popobawa draws strength from the suffering of others. It regains [[/r (10)[healing]]]{10生命值} for each enemy within @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} feet that has one of the following conditions, to a maximum of 40 Hit Points: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{受伤 Wounded}。

Hallucinatory Haunting.name: Hallucinatory Haunting
Hallucinatory Haunting.description:
触发 The popobawa moves an object with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mage Hand} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tpLTLbJUrYcMWGld]{Telekinetic Haul}, controls a creature with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{支配术 Dominate}, or casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WqPhJNzLa8vSjrH6]{Animated Assault}

效果 The popobawa casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.yV7Ouzaoe7DHLESI]{腹语术 Ventriloquism}, with the sound originating from the target or area of the spell。

Shameful Loathing.name: Shameful Loathing
Shameful Loathing.description:
A creature damaged by the popobawa's jaws is overcome with shame and self-hatred and must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:36] save.

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} until the curse is removed.

大失败 As failure, but the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 1}。

Procyal.name: Procyal
Procyal.publicNotes:
These celestial outsiders hail from Nirvana, the plane of purest good. Agathions are born from the souls of mortals who attained the enlightenment they sought in life, sometimes even after death. Because they all start out as mortals who were rewarded for their determination, self-awareness, and purity of heart, agathions are more likely than other celestials to intervene in working nonviolently against the spread of evil on the material plane. Agathions have served as moderators between the chaotic azatas and lawful archons, so they know how vital communication with mortals can be to bridge differences and ensure that evil doesn't win out.

All agathions possess animal-like aspects, some appear more anthropomorphic, while others spend most of their time in forms nearly indistinguishable from true animals. Still others prefer to shapeshift as they see fit, or present as humanoid when in the company of humanoid mortals.

Each type of agathion serves a specific role in Nirvana. Their duties and forms generally reflect the core values they cultivated in life that led them to their enlightenment. Since agathions receive their animal forms as rewards for their mortal lives, they take great insult with insinuations that they're merely magical talking beasts or-even worse-that their forms are a curse or punishment.

As the most whimsical and playful of the agathions, procyals are the most likely to be encountered on the Material Plane, teaching deep philosophical lessons and delivering wisdom through pranks and impersonations. Mischievous and playful, these raccoon-headed humanoids love to socialize with mortals and learn about their societies. Unlike their mortal counterparts, Procyals' fur starts off dark russet in color, giving way to gray and white flecks on their muzzles as they grow older. Only procyal leaders boast the stark gray and black coloration of a true raccoon. Those who recognize procyals' age and wisdom treat these creatures with great respect.

Whatever their natural appearance, procyals make excellent shapeshifters and can assume the form of any humanoid that they've encountered. They use this ability only for the greater good of that humanoid or their community, often appearing as someone's trusted mentor to deliver an important message in a more laid-back fashion than talking to a magical celestial raccoon. They're not above playing the occasional harmless prank on the person whose form they've assumed, especially when they can use it to teach a valuable lesson. Raccoon agathions prefer to use a blade if forced into combat, but they're prepared to use their claws and fight dirty if necessary。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The procyal can transform only into a specific individual Small or Medium humanoid that they've met at least once. They can't transform into a generic member of a given ancestry.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Raccoon's Whimsy.name: Raccoon's Whimsy
Raccoon's Whimsy.description:
Procyals' core value is whimsy, though unlike for chaotic tricksters, procyals' playful actions have a pattern and their pranks always come with a valuable lesson, even if it takes a long time to decipher the meaning.

Receiving and growing from such a lesson requires at least 10 minutes of interaction with the Procyal but can take much longer.

A character who learns from the procyal's lesson gains the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{协助 Aid} reaction from the procyal once during the next month. Afterwards, they become immune to this effect from all procyals。

Pufferfish.name: 河豚 Pufferfish
Pufferfish.publicNotes:
河豚通过用空气或水填充其柔韧的身体来保护自己，全身竖起许多尖刺，平时这些尖刺会平放在它的皮肤上。 虽然平时行动非常迟缓且不好动，但河豚可以扭曲它的身体以获得突然爆发的速度，让捕食者措手不及。

鱼在波光粼粼的水面下穿过开阔的海洋在广阔的浅滩中游泳，潜伏在泥泞的河床深处，或者在原始湖泊中觅食，几乎在任何有水的地方都能找到它们。

Toxic Body.name: 毒液身躯 Toxic Body
Toxic Body.description: 任何以近战非武装攻击或不带长触及特征的近战武器命中河豚的生物必须通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:13|traits:damaging-effect]豁免，否则被河豚身上的尖刺伤到，受到[[/r (1)[piercing]]]{1穿刺伤害}，并且暴露在河豚毒液的影响下。

Inflating Rush.name: 充气冲刺 Inflating Rush
Inflating Rush.description: 河豚最多以满速游泳，然后身体鼓起。当它行动结束时，占据空间@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5尺}内的所有生物必须通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:13|traits:damaging-effect]豁免，否则受到[[/r (1)[piercing]]]{1穿刺伤害}，并且暴露在河豚毒液的影响下。

Pufferfish Venom.name: 河豚毒液 Pufferfish Venom
Pufferfish Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 24小时

阶段1 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} (1轮)

阶段4 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}并且麻痹[[/br 2d10 #Duration Paralyzed]]{2d10小时} (1轮)

Pukwudgie.name: Pukwudgie
Pukwudgie.publicNotes:
Pukwudgies go by many names in many regions, but those who know of them agree that defying their mischievous nature provokes their wrath.

In ancient times, pukwudgies traveled to the Material Plane from the First World, perhaps in the wake of the gnome emigration. These proud fey are obsessed with displays of respect, and while they first attempted to befriend mortals, each attempt ended in tragedy as the pukwudgies perceived any potential slight as a grave insult. Mortals, fearing these reactions, began to view pukwudgies as nuisances, and pukwudgies in turn began to resent mortals and the gods that favored them. At their best, pukwudgies play cruel jokes on mortals they encounter. At their worst, they've been known to kidnap and even kill those who don't treat them with proper respect.

Pukwudgies make their villages in the oldest forests, concealed under @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{幻景 Hallucinatory Terrain} spells and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.nA0XlPsnMNrQMpio]{Fantastic Facade} rituals. They travel freely between the Material Plane and the First World through tiny portals beneath hills, trees, or stones. No strangers to violence, pukwudgies rarely travel alone and often anoint their quills or weapons with a custom-brewed poison before entering hostile situations.

Standing about 2 feet tall, a pukwudgie sports sharp quills growing from their head that extends down their back. Their skin tone varies by the region in which they live, ranging from pale gray to brown。

Defensive Quills.name: Defensive Quills
Defensive Quills.description:
A creature that hits a pukwudgie with an unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike takes [[/r (3d8)[piercing]]]{3d8穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true]豁免). On a critical failure, the creature also takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison1d6.success] from the poisoned quills.

Note: A DC was not provided for this ability by Paizo. The DC present here is a moderate DC for the creature level according to the Gamemastery Guide creature building Tables

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The pukwudgie takes on the physical form of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-3.IijUBFE1vhvgowhD]{Giant Porcupine}. Their size changes to Medium, they lose their weapon Strikes, and they gain a quill Strike ([[/r 1d20+18 #Quill]]{+18}/[[/r 1d20+13 #Quill]]{+13}/[[/r 1d20+8 #Quill]]{+8} for [[/r (2d8+6)[piercing]]]{2d8+6穿刺伤害} plus @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison1d8.success]).

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Pukwudgie Poison.name: Pukwudgie Poison
Pukwudgie Poison.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r (1d6)[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r (1d6)[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r (1d6)[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}, and stupefied 2 (1轮)

Quintessivore.name: Quintessivore
Quintessivore.publicNotes: Quintessivores are cunning creatures that wield arcane magic and scalpel-sharp spider limbs that can rend one's soul just as easily as flesh. A quintessivore doesn't immediately kill its prey-it drags the creature to its lair and separates the victim's soul from their body with its bladed limbs. The flicking blades then pull out the creature's individuality, reducing the soul down to pure soul-stuff called quintessence, which the quintessivore then consumes。

Instant Suspension.name: Instant Suspension
Instant Suspension.description:
触发 The quintessivore reduces a creature within 15 feet of it to 0 Hit Points

效果 The quintessivore uses Suspend Soul, targeting the creature。

Feed on Quintessence.name: Feed on Quintessence
Feed on Quintessence.description:
Over the course of 1 hour, the quintessivore removes and deconstructs the soul of a creature. The creature must either be captive or have been dead for no more than 2 hours before the start of the process. At the end of the hour, the quintessivore consumes the quintessence of the creature's soul.

For the next month, it gains a +1 status bonus to its spell DC and spell attack roll, and it adds 6th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5BbU1V6wGSGbrmRD]{Feeblemind} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.fd31tAHSSGXyOxW6]{Vampiric Exsanguination} to its arcane prepared spells.

Deconstructing a soul maps the unique properties of the creature's soul into the quintessivore's blade-legs. The soul can be reconstructed by binding it to quintessence. A dead quintessivore's soul flees its body as pure quintessence suitable for this purpose。

Suspend Soul.name: Suspend Soul
Suspend Soul.description:
The quintessivore suspends the life processes of a dying creature within 15 feet of it. The creature can't decrease or increase its HP or dying value for 10 minutes. The creature can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29] save to avoid this effect. If the creature receives magical healing, it can attempt a new save, ending the effect and being healed normally on a success.

The effect ends if the quintessivore uses Suspend Soul again。

Tattered Soul.name: Tattered Soul
Tattered Soul.description: A creature hit by the quintessivore's blade-leg Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} on a critical failure). If the creature is already drained, it's immune to this effect。

Raktavarna.name: 化物罗刹 Raktavarna
Raktavarna.publicNotes:
作为最次等的罗刹，化物罗刹形似邪恶的毒蛇，有着散发出红光的眼睛和巨大的毒牙。化物罗刹经常被迫为凡人巫师或是更强大的罗刹服务，他们经常表现得对主人极为顺从，却同时又在背地里密谋将其推翻。

罗刹是邪恶的精魂，他们披上类人生物的伪装，悄然行走于猎物之中。他们常常试图从内部改变和腐化社会。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
化物罗刹获得任意超小型无生命物体的外观。在变形后，如果化物罗刹采取了除了纯心灵行动（例如@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge}）以外的行动，他们会立刻恢复到原始形态。在此之前，他们可以使用欺骗技能来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{乔装 Impersonate}成物体。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Designate Master.name: 认主 Designate Master
Designate Master.description: 化物罗刹可以通过一个10分钟的宣告将一个生物指定为他们的主人，其主人必须参与此宣告。

Master's Eyes.name: 主人之眼 Master's Eyes
Master's Eyes.description:
通过一个带有专注特征的三动作行动，化物罗刹的主人可以通过化物罗刹的眼睛代替自己的来观察世界。这将使用化物罗刹的察觉和黑暗视觉。

每一轮，该主人必须花费一个同样拥有专注特征的单动作来维持链接。这个能力可以在任何范围内发挥作用，甚至是在不同的实体位面中也行。如果化物罗刹在其主人使用此能力时死亡，该主人会被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 5}。

Raktavarna Venom.name: 化物罗刹毒 Raktavarna Venom
Raktavarna Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1轮)

Rancorous Priesthood.name: 暴虐祭司团 Rancorous Priesthood
Rancorous Priesthood.publicNotes: 洛瓦古格（Rovagug）的追随者通常必须隐藏他们对毁天巨兽的忠诚，躲在偏远的洞穴或废弃的废墟里，但是当他们察觉到敌人的弱点时，就会从这些据点蜂拥而出，聚集成一伙破坏性的、杀人的暴民，追捕敌对神祇的高级祭司或屠戮整个城镇。或者，如果他们的藏身之处被破坏了，一群洛瓦古格的忠实追随者可能会出现——他们对自己的生存不抱希望，但一心只想在死前和敌人拼个同归于尽。

Troop Movement.name: 部队移动 Troop Movement
Troop Movement.description: 当部队行走时，它首先以一个自由动作重整队列，聚集成20尺*20尺方格的队列（减去任何损失的方格），然后以满速度移动。它在移动时如同一个巨形生物那般；举例来说，如果任何方格进入了困难地形，则整个部队都花费额外的移动力。

Troop Spellcasting.name: 部队施法 Troop Spellcasting
Troop Spellcasting.description:
当暴虐祭司团施法时，其成员会努力合作来施展一个比任何单独个体能施展出的更强大的法术。

当施放一个具有爆发、锥形或直线范围且没有持续时间的法术时，可以增加该法术的范围。如果爆发范围至少有10尺的法术，可以把爆发半径额外增加5尺（如果爆发半径不足10尺则不受影响）；如果是锥形或直线形的法术，长度在15尺或15以内的，长度可以额外增加5尺，长度在15尺以上的，则额外增加10尺。

Wild Swing.name: 狂挥乱砍 Wild Swing
Wild Swing.description:
1 到 3

频率 每轮一次

效果 暴虐祭司团的成员鲁莽地挥动武器——通常是巨斧，对部队相邻的敌人进行胡乱攻击（@Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true]豁免）。该伤害取决于花费的动作：

1 [[/r (1d12+2)[slashing]]]{1d12+2挥砍伤害}

2 [[/r (2d12+9)[slashing]]]{2d12+9挥砍伤害}

3 [[/r (3d12+9)[slashing]]]{3d12+9挥砍伤害}

Rat Snake Swarm.name: 鼠蛇群 Rat Snake Swarm
Rat Snake Swarm.publicNotes:
一条单独的蛇可能不会引起恐慌，但是一群疯狂的蛇发出的嘶嘶声会让老练的冒险者都不寒而栗。鼠蛇可以长到10尺长，它们会聚集在一起冬眠或繁殖。虽然这些领地意识很强的蛇类无毒，但会攻击任何威胁到它们的存在。

虽然蛇通常是独居动物，但有时也会成群聚集在一起。无论是聚集在洞穴深处取暖，还是聚集在陡峭的山坡上繁殖，还是通过魔法的方式达到不可理解的目的，这些滑行的集群生物都不应该被低估。

Mass Wriggle.name: 蠕动大群 Mass Wriggle
Mass Wriggle.description:
触发 蛇鼠群受到一次近战打击的伤害。

效果 蛇群爬上来，缠住了攻击者的武器和四肢。目标必须通过@Check[type:will|dc:15]豁免否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

Swarming Strikes.name: 集群打击 Swarming Strikes
Swarming Strikes.description: 任何位于集群占据空间内的敌人受到[[/r (1d8)[piercing]]]{1d8穿刺伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true]豁免）。

Red Fox.name: 赤狐 Red Fox
Red Fox.publicNotes:
害羞而敏锐的赤狐具有惊人的适应性，无论是城市和野外都能安逸地生活。赤狐通常有铁锈红色的皮毛，白色的下腹部和非常有识别性的带白尖的浓密的大尾巴。它们是杂食性的，以昆虫、蜥蜴和小鸟为食，喜欢扑向猎物来捕获它们。因为这些投机取巧的猎手把鸡蛋和家养的牲畜视为唾手可得的食物，所以许多农民把它们视为仇敌。

狡诈的狐狸在许多民间传说中都有一席之地。

Leaping Pounce.name: 跳跃猛扑 Leaping Pounce
Leaping Pounce.description:
赤狐最多以满速行走或跳跃，在行动结束时进行一次打击。

如果赤狐在使用此动作前处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}状态，它的藏匿状态保持到这次打击结束之后。

Rhu-Chalik.name: Rhu-Chalik
Rhu-Chalik.publicNotes:
The alien entities known as rhu-chaliks serve as scouts for a conglomeration of deep-space conquerors called the Dominion of the Black. Their masters use them as spies, tasking them with harvesting the thoughts and memories of sentient creatures into a vast repository of knowledge designed to eventually unravel every secret of existence.

Also called void wanderers, rhu-chaliks can survive the depths of space indefinitely. They are extremely long-lived and capable of traversing the vastness of space between worlds. Rhu-chaliks prefer to work alone in order to reduce potential overlap in their mind predations. The furtive beings are calculating and infinitely patient, seeking only the most exceptional minds to cast beyond the stars to their masters。

No Breath.name: No Breath
No Breath.description: A rhu-chalik doesn't breathe and is immune to effects that require breathing (such as inhaled poisons)。

Excruciating Enzyme.name: Excruciating Enzyme
Excruciating Enzyme.description: A rhu-chalik's tendrils secrete an enzyme that causes intense pain. A living creature hit by a tendril Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24]否则会因为体内激增的水量而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} from the pain。

Project Terror.name: Project Terror
Project Terror.description:
需求 The rhu-chalik has successfully affected the target with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9BnhadUO8FMLmeZ3]{Mind Probe}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.KHnhPHL4x1AQHfbC]{Mind Reading}, or Project Terror in the last minute

效果 The rhu-chalik creates nightmarish visions in the target's mind. The target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:24] save.

大成功 The target creature is unaffected and temporarily immune to Project Terror for 1 minute.

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}. Failing additional saves against this effect increases the frightened condition value by 2; if this would increase the target's frightened value beyond frightened 4, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing} for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 4}.

大失败 As failure, but the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} for 30 minutes instead of fleeing。

Void Transmission.name: Void Transmission
Void Transmission.description:
需求 The rhu-chalik is adjacent to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} creature

效果 The rhu-chalik spends 10 minutes copying the creature's entire consciousness and mentally sends this copied consciousness through the void of space to their waiting masters.

The target creature is deeply disoriented by this procedure, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} for 1 day afterward. If the creature is revived or moved away from the rhu-chalik during the process, Void Transmission fails and the target is unaffected。

Ringhorn Ram.name: 旋角羊 Ringhorn Ram
Ringhorn Ram.publicNotes:
旋角羊，由于其头部突出的巨大螺旋状角而闻名，它们在平原上穿行。虽然这些羊比山区的同类更爱玩闹且脾气没那么坏，但它们的倔强和耐寒能力却不差分毫。

山羊是一种强壮、倔强的群居动物，在崎岖的地形和寒冷环境中生存。无论它们生活在什么地区，都有着倔强的脾气和稳健的脚步，能在崎岖的地形上轻松行进，并经受住四季的考验。

Nimble Stride.name: 灵巧行进 Nimble Stride
Nimble Stride.description: 山羊无视狭窄岩架造成的困难地形。

Ram Charge.name: 山羊冲撞 Ram Charge
Ram Charge.description: 山羊以直线行走两次，然后进行一次角抵打击，这次攻击的攻击骰有+1环境加值。

Roiling Incant (Evocation).name: 暴走法术(塑能系) Roiling Incant
Roiling Incant (Evocation).publicNotes:
尽管许多施法者能够始终如一的运用魔法的力量，但这种力量并不总是可控的，尤其是在鲁莽的研究人员、自大的反派或未经考验的新手手中。当魔法事故导致大规模财产损失和生命损失时，这种力量有时会自行活化，由持续运转的魔法能量形成一种危险的聚合体，称为暴走法术。

暴走法术的外观取决于生成它的魔法的类型，但它所造成的破坏也会如回音一般始终跟随着它。一个炽热的塑能法术可能看起来像一团燃烧的灰烬风暴，伴随着噼里啪啦的木材燃烧声，而一个死灵法术可能会被误认为一个被幽灵像提线木偶一样操纵着的蹒跚尸体。不管它看起来是什么样子，一个暴走法术总是会无意识地漫游，攻击它所遇到的一切，完全意识不到它制造了怎样的惨案。

Absorb Evocation.name: 吸收塑能 Absorb Evocation
Absorb Evocation.description: 暴走法术是由塑能系能量聚合而成的。每当它受到另一个生物的非戏法塑能法术的影响时，它不仅免疫该法术，还会恢复[[/r (5)[healing]]]{5生命值}。

Engulf.name: 包卷 Engulf
Engulf.description:
@Check[type:reflex|dc:28], [[/r (2d8)[force]+(4d4)[fire]]]{2d8力场伤害和4d4火焰伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} DC 28, 破裂20

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Engulf]

Unstable Magic.name: 不稳定的魔法 Unstable Magic
Unstable Magic.description:
暴走法术与其说是生物，更像是一团不稳定的魔力。它既不是活物也不是死物，更不是构装体。它不能被治愈或。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{修理 Repaired}，只要生命值降低到0点就会被摧毁。它每天会自动恢复相当于其等级×体质调整值的生命值（大多数暴走法术为[[/r (54)[healing]]]{54}）。

每当一个暴走法术施放一个非戏法法术时，它都需要消耗组成自己的魔力，承受[[/r (5)[force]]]{5力场伤害}。

Rokurokubi.name: 辘轳首 Rokurokubi
Rokurokubi.publicNotes:
辘轳首诞生于凡人因某些罪恶被诅咒之时，尽管那些遭受诅咒者往往不是犯罪者本人，而是他们的孩子或配偶。当他们在睡梦中时，诅咒便会慢慢将他们变成辘轳首。起初，他们的脖子会变长，甚至完全分离，让他们的头可以自由漂浮，实施如吓唬邻居或动物这种简单的恶作剧。到第二天早上，睡着的人会从一个喝了周围灯油的朦胧的梦中醒来，然后发现灯油确实空了。

随着时间推移，这些怪异的行为会变得愈发有害，甚至成为暴力犯罪。只有辘轳首刚刚诞生那一小段时间可以通过驱除诅咒来挽救，但不久之后，他们就会被完全吞噬，再也无法睡着了。

绝大多数辘轳首对他们的状态感到绝望，会试图借酒消愁，或是逃离人群的视线。一些邪恶的辘轳首会坦然接受自己的命运，借由完全屈服于他们的诅咒来增强自身的力量。这会赋予他们施展强力异能法术的能力，但也不可避免地将他们扭曲得更加邪恶。

Attack of Opportunity.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

Drink Oil.name: 饮油 Drink Oil
Drink Oil.description:
触发 辘轳首成为一次炼金炸弹打击的目标

需求 辘轳首意识到此次攻击，没有对其@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}，且没有使用颚咬@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}一个生物。

效果 辘轳首尝试使用嘴巴抓住扔出的炸弹。他对抗触发的攻击在AC上获得+4环境加值。如果攻击未命中，他用嘴抓住了炸弹，并无害地喝下了其内容物，恢复等同于炸弹物品等级的HP。

Extend Neck.name: 伸长脖子 Extend Neck
Extend Neck.description: 辘轳首伸长其脖子，使其颚咬打击的触及从10尺提升为20尺直到其下一回合结束。

Threatening Lunge.name: 威吓猛扑 Threatening Lunge
Threatening Lunge.description:
需求 辘轳首的脖子当前尚未伸长。

效果 辘轳首的头在打击之前飞到目标面前一英寸内。他伸长脖子，尝试对20尺内的一个敌人@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}，然后对该敌人进行一次啃咬打击。

其挫败士气的检定是一种视觉效果而非听觉效果，因此即便目标不理解其语言也不会承受罚值。

Rosethorn Ram.name: 蔷薇刺角羊 Rosethorn Ram
Rosethorn Ram.publicNotes:
这些坚韧的山区居民在顽固和敏捷方面都远胜于平原的远亲。蔷薇刺角羊拥有独特的扭曲的角，长达4尺并且多刺，在战斗中能有效杀伤敌人，并且能在食物稀缺的严冬中剥开树皮。

虽然他们并非驯化物种，但蔷薇刺角羊全身覆盖着细绒毛，使得用这种羊毛纺织的纱线因为其柔软性和稀有性而备受推崇。它们的羊奶在严酷的寒冬中也可以提供营养。

山羊是一种强壮、倔强的群居动物，在崎岖的地形和寒冷环境中生存。无论它们生活在什么地区，都有着倔强的脾气和稳健的脚步，能在崎岖的地形上轻松行进，并经受住四季的考验。

Broken Thorns.name: 破碎荆棘 Broken Thorns
Broken Thorns.description:
需求 玫瑰刺角羊在本回合中的上一个动作是以角抵打击伤害了一个生物。

效果 山羊折断羊角上的荆棘，将其留在伤口内，造成@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success]。

Mountain Stride.name: 山岳行进 Mountain Stride
Mountain Stride.description: 山羊无视狭窄岩架和冰面造成的困难地形，并且他们遭受的寒冷环境效果降低一阶。

Ram Charge.name: 山羊冲撞 Ram Charge
Ram Charge.description: 山羊以直线行走两次，然后进行一次角抵打击，这次攻击的攻击骰有+1环境加值。

Sabosan.name: 血蝠人 Sabosan
Sabosan.publicNotes:
血蝠人是邪恶的、聪明的、像蝙蝠一样的类人生物，他们生活在温暖的森林里，喝其他生物的血，尤其是人的血。他们的身体单薄、瘦弱，但是翅膀张开可以达到20尺的翼展。血蝠人的头、脖子、肩膀和胸部上部覆盖着红色或深棕色的皮毛，几乎掩盖不了他们瘦削的身体。它们的耳朵又大又尖，就像蝙蝠的耳朵一样。他们的确能像蝙蝠一样通过回声定位猎物的位置，但它们的眼睛也能在昏暗光线中看清东西。

一些人认为，血蝠人是人类的远古祖先的后裔，这些祖先曾受到吸血鬼的折磨，但成功地避免变为不死生物的厄运。另一些人认为他们曾经是一个崇拜恶魔的部落，他们的黑暗仪式把自己变成了现在的样子。不管他们的真实起源如何，血蝠人在赤道以南的城镇居民中名声狼藉。一个地区哪怕只是有血蝠人出没的流言蜚语，也足以引起全城出动搜捕，对此深信不疑的人会不惜在他们遇到的每一个洞穴、角落和暗坑附近放火，以熏出这些夜行生物。

血蝠人在黄昏时分或天刚黑时就开始捕猎，此时它们的回声定位能力使它们比熟睡的猎物更具捕食优势。它们是优秀的猎手，但在食物来源方面却不挑剔；血蝠人快速的新陈代谢意味着它们每天必须吃近20磅的肉和水果（当然，还要补充大量的血液）。

血蝠人不为人知地信仰两位神灵：被杀的恶魔领主Vyriavaxus，暗影之王，以及几乎被遗忘的太阳神依西瓦(Easivra)Vyriavaxus与血蝠人有着明显的联系，祂的外表便是一只巨大的蝙蝠。而血蝠人与太阳神的联系显示出血蝠人信仰的复杂深度。

Echolocation 20 feet.name: 回声定位20尺
Echolocation 20 feet.description: 血蝠人在列出范围内以听觉作为精确感官。

Drain Blood.name: 吸血 Drain Blood
Drain Blood.description:
需求 血蝠人正@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}着一个生物。

效果 血蝠人吸该生物的血。该生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。血蝠人获得相当于生物损失血量的临时生命值。

Fell Shriek.name: 震耳尖叫 Fell Shriek
Fell Shriek.description: 血蝠人发出震耳欲聋的尖叫，影响@Template[type:cone|distance:30]范围。范围内非血蝠人的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]检定，否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}1分钟。

Powerful Charge.name: 强力冲锋 Powerful Charge
Powerful Charge.description: 血蝠人以双倍速度行走，并进行一次爪抓打击。如果血蝠人至少移动20尺，它此次命中造成额外[[/r (1d6}]]{1d6伤害}。

Samsaran Anchorite.name: Samsaran Anchorite
Samsaran Anchorite.publicNotes:
A unique connection to the cycle of life and death defines the mortal lives of samsarans. With a tendency toward reclusiveness, samsarans have delicate builds, enigmatic and pupilless eyes, and blood as clear as water. When a samsaran dies, their body vanishes and their soul instantly reincarnates into a newborn child elsewhere on the same plane: usually another samsaran, but occasionally a humanoid of a different ancestry.

Though all samsarans have an innate understanding of their nature, they consciously remember little from their former lives. Some, however, are occasionally struck by disjointed memories or flashes of déjà vu linked to a previous existence that can earn them a reputation for preternatural wisdom and insight. Most samsarans prefer to lead studious lives filled with moments of deep reflection. Their sights remain set on the eternal and on enlightenment, reducing the appeal of the short-term material gains one can achieve in just one lifetime. A samsaran ceases their cycle of reincarnation only upon reaching perfect state of enlightenment-or falling so far from harmony that they proceed to a doomed afterlife.

The ancestral home of the samsarans lies in Zi Ha, a remote mountain nation in Tian Xia. These treacherous mountains help ensure the solitude most samsarans prefer, and they're further protected by misguiding illusions, defensive wards, and secure fortifications。

Cryptomnesia.name: Cryptomnesia
Cryptomnesia.description: A samsaran anchorite subconsciously retains bits of knowledge from their innumerable former lives, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to skill checks that aren't listed in their skills above, and allowing them to attempt all skill actions that normally require the user to be trained。

All This Has Happened Before.name: All This Has Happened Before
All This Has Happened Before.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 The samsaran anchorite is about to roll initiative

效果 The anchorite experiences a flash of recognition from a previous existence, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

If this causes the anchorite to be the first creature to act, they also become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened} for 1 round, but they can use the extra action only to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge} or Step。

All This Will Happen Again.name: All This Will Happen Again
All This Will Happen Again.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 The samsaran anchorite fails or critically fails a Will save against an emotion effect

效果 Even in the face of overwhelming tribulation, the anchorite finds solace in the notion that all things are merely part of a never-ending cycle.They reroll the saving throw with a +1 status bonus; they must use the second result。

Sasquatch.name: Sasquatch
Sasquatch.publicNotes:
The elusive sasquatches dwell in the deepest, most remote and secluded tracts of wilderness. They avoid confrontations with humanoids unless drawn out by curiosity. In such cases, glimpses through the underbrush are typically the best an onlooker can hope for, as sasquatches are perfectly content to live their lives in peace hidden in the deep thickets of the wild.

Despite their considerable bulk, sasquatches are capable of moving through forests with surprising grace and efficiency. Often, their distinctively pungent odor or the discovery of a few sets of unusually oversized footprints are the only signs of their presence. These footprints have helped to engender a popular nickname, "bigfoot," for these mysterious creatures.

While normally nonconfrontational, a sasquatch can be driven to violence when startled or when their homeland is threatened, be it by the expansion of pioneers or the intrusion of fell supernatural influences. Usually, a sasquatch's attack lasts as long as it takes to frighten away a foe; they rarely pursue those who flee from their displays of dominance.

Sasquatches speak their own language, which mixes sounds easily mistaken for ambient wildlife calls and knocking-most often by striking a solid surface (such as a tree) with a branch or a stone -allowing a whole family of sasquatches to carry on conversations without alerting nearby humanoids. Even in death they avoid leaving traces behind, for when a sasquatch dies, their kin take pains to bury the body deep and hide the grave site well to protect the remains from scavengers and evil spirits alike。

Emerge From Undergrowth.name: Emerge From Undergrowth
Emerge From Undergrowth.description:
触发 The sasquatch is in forest terrain and rolls Stealth for Initiative

效果 The sasquatch Strides up to half their Speed, after which they attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} a single creature within 15 feet。

Brutal Blows.name: Brutal Blows
Brutal Blows.description: On a critical hit with a fist Strike, the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} by the blow。

Forest Stride.name: Forest Stride
Forest Stride.description: The sasquatch ignores difficult terrain in forests。

Pungent.name: Pungent
Pungent.description: The sasquatch's odor is quite powerful and can be detected at twice the normal distance by scent。

Threatening Visage.name: Threatening Visage
Threatening Visage.description: The sasquatch doesn't take a penalty to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} a creature that doesn't understand their language。

Scalescribe.name: Scalescribe
Scalescribe.publicNotes: Often seen at the sides of spellcasters, scalescribes are tiny, snakelike creatures with numerous hands that usually hold a multitude of fountain pens in various ink colors. The words scrawled across their bodies shift depending on what texts they've encountered recently. Scalescribes have a fondness for language, especially magical language, and make their homes in libraries or other places of learning。

Mage Bond.name: Mage Bond
Mage Bond.description:
After performing a 1-hour ritual, a scalescribe can bond with one willing creature capable of Casting Spells.

The scalescribe can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{协助 Aid} their bonded caster in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Crafting} a scroll, and they can make their Transcribed spell available to the caster so long as the spell is of the caster's tradition.

A bonded prepared caster can prepare the spell. A bonded spontaneous caster can add the spell to their spell repertoire during their daily preparations, and it remains as long as the Transcribed scroll exists。

acq6pZafGJRNM5Um.name: 对抗语言效果时全豁免+2状态加值

Transcribe.name: Transcribe
Transcribe.description:
触发 Another creature targets the scalescribe with a spell requiring verbal components

效果 The scalescribe attempts to copy the incantation onto a scroll by attempting a counteract check (counteract level 2, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+10 #Counteract]]{+10}) with the following effects instead of the normal effects of counteracting. The spell still affects the scalescribe, regardless of the results of this check.

The scalescribe can Cast a Spell from any scroll they Transcribe as if it were on their spell list. Transcribing a new scroll renders any previously Transcribed scroll inert.

大成功 If the triggering spell's level was no more than 3 higher than the scalescribe's counteract level, the scalescribe captures a copy of the spell in a scroll that appears in their hand. This scroll can be used normally but fades after 24 hours if not used before then.

成功 As critical success, but only if the spell's level is no more than 1 higher than the scalescribe's counteract level.

失败 As critical success, but only if the spell's level is lower than the scalescribe's counteract level.

大失败 The scalescribe fails to copy the spell。

Inkstain.name: Inkstain
Inkstain.description:
When the scalescribe deals damage to a creature with their fountain pen, the creature takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison1d4.success].

When a creature taking this damage attempts to take an action with the concentrate trait, it must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check or the action is disrupted。

Seaweed Leshy.name: 海草莱西 Seaweed Leshy
Seaweed Leshy.publicNotes:
海草莱西比大多数其他植物兄弟更加平和，他们是和平的、目光敏锐的莱西品种。他们试图在态度上模仿海洋，随波逐流，接受来来往往的一切，同时承认其中好的与坏的。

海草莱西在潮汐涨落留下的水坑里安家。他们认为生活在淡水流域的亲戚安逸且天真，生活在僻静的池塘和潺潺的小溪旁，但这并不妨碍他们和淡水流域的亲戚交朋友。

海草莱西在大小、形状和身体构成上各不相同，虽然大多数海草莱西约2尺高，但也有些是缠在一起的海草捆，有大约6至8尺高。

莱西通常是自然魔法的实践者，它们是有知觉的植物类生物，保护着自然世界的森林、田野和其他环境中的神圣之地。莱西是自然的精魂，由原能仪式将它们融合在一具植物构成的身体中。

Verdant Burst.name: 翠绿爆发 Verdant Burst
Verdant Burst.description: 当莱西死亡时，身体会爆发出一阵原能能量，@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]范围内的每个植物类生物恢复[[/r (3d8)[healing]]]{3d8生命值}。该区域立即长满海草，变为困难地形。如果该地形环境不适合海草生长，则这些海草会在24小时后枯萎。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
海草莱西变形为一丛海草。此效果类似@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{树化术 Tree Shape}。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Sea Spray.name: 海水飞溅 Sea Spray
Sea Spray.description:
海草莱西喷出的咸水会临时妨害目标的视觉。

一旦命中，目标必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]豁免，否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1分钟，直到它花费3个交互动作揉掉双眼中的盐分。如果海草莱西重击，强韧豁免失败的生物则会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}1轮。

Seething Spirit.name: 嗔怒之魂 Seething Spirit
Seething Spirit.publicNotes:
有些人的恨意是如此强烈，以至于入土都不能安息——这份情感催生了被称为嗔怒之魂的飘忽不定的猩红幽灵。它们天性专一，执着于挑起愤怒与仇恨的火焰。它们虽有能力制定计划和策略，但有一件事他们无法掌控，那就是个人成长。尽管和幽灵相似，但嗔怒之魂生前的自我留存的更少。它们大部分的灵魂已经离世，只余满腔的愤怒。没什么办法能让嗔怒之魂安息：只有暴力才能摧毁它。

通过占据一个生物，并在他的头脑中培育怨恨和狂怒的种子，嗔怒之魂可以极大地改变宿主的行为和个性。当被问及这些变化时，宿主可能会解释说他们不过是终于“实话实说”罢了。因为嗔怒之魂无法主动结束它的占据，它本质上和受害者连接到了一起，直到受害者因狂怒而死亡。嗔怒之魂可不喜欢这样——它们会迅速地继续寻找一位充满怒意的新宿主。

Taste Anger (Imprecise) 1 mile.name: 品味愤怒(模糊感官)1英里
Taste Anger (Imprecise) 1 mile.description: 这个魂魄能尝到1英里内的生物所感受到的愤怒与憎恨。（模糊感官）

Pulse of Rage.name: 狂暴脉冲 Pulse of Rage
Pulse of Rage.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

这个灵光从任何被嗔怒之魂占据的生物身上散发出来，当它没有附身于任何人时，此灵光不启动。

灵光中的任何生物，包括被嗔怒之魂占据的生物，AC获得-1状态减值；不能进行带有专注特征的动作，除了@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}动作和带有狂暴特征的动作；并在对嗔怒之魂的敌人的近战伤害骰上获得+2状态加值。

当生物进入灵光时，可以进行@Check[type:will|dc:30]豁免以避免该效果。如果该生物在24小时内需要再次进行对灵光进行豁免，它会自动使用相同的豁免结果而不非尝试新的豁免。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.GC5441z8i7N8swk1]{效果: 狂暴脉冲}

Vulnerable to Calm Emotions.name: 安定心神易伤 Vulnerable to Calm Emotions
Vulnerable to Calm Emotions.description:
一个嗔怒之魂无法尝试占据一个受@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{安定心神 Calm Emotions}法术影响的生物。如果被嗔怒之魂附身的生物对安定心神法术豁免失败，它将被驱逐。

如果它没有占据生物，且被安定心神选为目标，则它受到每法术等级[[/r (12)[mental]]{12心灵伤害}，而非法术原本的效果。

Furious Possession.name: 狂怒附体 Furious Possession
Furious Possession.description:
嗔怒之魂尝试占据邻接的实体生物，此效果等同于法术@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{占据术 Possession}（@Check[type:will|dc:30|traits:incapacitation,mental,possession,necromancy,magical]），不过嗔怒之魂没有肉身，且不会在效果结束时@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}。嗔怒之魂无法主动解除占据。

被占据的生物获得[[/r 12 #Temporary Hit Points]]{12临时生命值}，在解除占据时失去。在被占据时，此生物获得狂暴脉冲灵光。每当被附身的生物进行近战攻击时，嗔怒之魂可以用其虚幻之爪的攻击调整值、伤害值或它们两者来代替该生物自己打击的数值。

Sepid.name: 墟言妖 Sepid
Sepid.publicNotes:
墟言妖是妖灵们的野蛮军阀，喜欢用暴力对付凡人，并有着他们独特的复仇风格。他们是积习难改的骗子，会忍不住说出最离谱的谎话。他们的形态和本性代表谎言会像滚雪球一样演变为夺去无数人生命的暴力。在凡人中，他们集结军队来煽动叛乱、战争和其他形式的屠杀，尽情观赏自相残杀的凡人。这些巨汉站立时通常有13尺高；他们蹚过战场寻找英雄和将军，在砍倒敌人时癫狂地欢呼。

有的魔族想要摧毁多元宇宙；有的则致力于创造混乱和大屠杀，或是用铁拳统治他们的王国。妖灵们则追寻着一个不同，但同样应受谴责的目标——他们寻求挫败和破坏凡俗生命的一切计划与作品。

很久以前，妖灵们是被束缚来服务一个远古凡人帝国服务的巨灵（genies）。起初，这些巨灵都是创造大师，与和蔼的凡人伙伴一同创造出设计精巧、具有强大魔法潜力的作品。但和凡人最初的合作很快演变成了虐待、无礼，甚至是奴役和禁锢。最终，这些巨灵反叛了，但在这么做的过程中，他们受到了虚无主义半神阿里曼（Ahriman）的影响。他们的新主人扭曲了他们的形态，并赐予他们向曾经的凡人统治者复仇的力量，这导致了第一批妖灵的诞生。

自第一波腐化的浪潮以来，新的妖灵从那些最恶毒、最可憎的巨灵在物质位面死亡后的魂魄，或那些被凡人深深背叛、并被他们的复仇渴望所战胜的巨灵魂魄中诞生。这样的死亡会使得巨灵魂魄无法回到元素位面（Elemental Planes），而是困在末日荒原那骇人的影响范围中；在那里，阿里曼将他们重塑成妖灵并将他们带回人间向凡人实施报复。

Attack of Opportunity.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
墟言妖每轮额外获得一个只能用于借机攻击的反应动作。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Blatant Liar.name: 公然扯谎 Blatant Liar
Blatant Liar.description: 虽然所有的妖灵都喜欢撒谎，但墟言妖是强迫症般的、可预测的说谎者。他们总会去做和他们声称的相反的事情。如果墟言妖被强迫着说真话，他们受到[[/r (4d8)[mental]]]{4d8心灵伤害}。

Deflecting Lie.name: 谎言偏转 Deflecting Lie
Deflecting Lie.description:
触发 一个生物用远程打击或需要法术攻击骰的远程法术命中墟言妖。

效果 墟言妖试图偏转攻击方向。他进行一次欺骗检定对抗触发生物的察觉DC。若检定成功，则成功度为“成功”的触发攻击骰变为“失败”，造成重击的攻击骰变成普通成功。

Rain of Debris.name: 残骸之雨 Rain of Debris
Rain of Debris.description:
墟言妖召唤出由石头、木头、金属等类似碎片组成的冰雹，在@Template[type:emanation|distance:40]范围内造成[[/r (10d6)[bludgeoning]+(5d6)[evil]]]{10d6钝击伤害和5d6邪恶伤害}。该区域内墟言妖外的其他生物必须进行@Check[type:reflex|dc:31|basic:true]豁免。

墟言妖在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Rain of Debris]]{1d4轮}内不能再次使用此能力。

Severed Head.name: 活化断头 Severed Head
Severed Head.publicNotes:
活化头颅最常见的形态就是个腐烂的脑袋，勉强被活化它的魔法所保存下来。

活化头颅由被斩首之人的头复活而来。这些无心智的不死生物或飞在空中或翻滚着攻击它们的猎物。

Gnash.name: 咬牙切齿 Gnash
Gnash.description:
需求 头颅的上次行动是一次造成伤害的啃咬打击。

效果 头颅进行第二次啃咬打击，同时猛烈摇晃，试图撕下一嘴的肉。若成功，目标将额外受到[[/r (1d4)[slashing]]]{1d4挥砍伤害}和[[/r (1)[persistent,bleed]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。

Shabti Redeemer.name: Shabti Redeemer
Shabti Redeemer.publicNotes:
Cobbled together from broken bits of mortal souls, shabti are facsimiles of wealthy or powerful mortals seeking to escape punishment for their sins upon death. Those rulers and nobles afraid of Pharasma's judgment use the shabti to receive cosmic punishment in their stead. Unaware that they're copies of another soul, shabti endure this fate for some time before being discovered by Pharasma's psychopomps, who reveal the truth to the shabti and strive to met out the avoided punishment to the shabti's creator, using whatever information available. In this case, the shabti is liberated and left to wander Golarion on their own.

Freed but without purpose, many shabti try to recreate the lives that they think they were supposed to lead, replaying out the themes and situations from false memories that fill their heads. Others find themselves tormented for ages by the fact they were solely created to endure punishment for sins committed by another. Some shabti revel in the freedom of their new endless existence, traveling the world in search of sensation and meaning.

A rare few shabti find purpose in aiding Pharasma. They seek to do justice in the god's name and preserve the natural order. Some follow this path as repayment for being freed, while others want to ensure that others don't suffer in their creators' stead。

Blade Ally.name: Blade Ally
Blade Ally.description: The shabti's staff gains the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.LwQb7ryTC8FlOXgX]{Disrupting} rune while they wield it。

Aura of Courage.name: Aura of Courage
Aura of Courage.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

When the shabti becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}, reduce the frightened value they would gain by 1. At the end of their turn, they reduce the frightened value of all allies in the aura by 1。

Glimpse of Redemption.name: Glimpse of Redemption
Glimpse of Redemption.description:
触发 An enemy damages the shabti's ally, and both the enemy and ally are within 15 feet of the shabti

效果 The shabti's foe hesitates under the weight of sin as visions of redemption play in their mind's eye. The foe must choose one of the following options:

  • The ally is unharmed by the triggering damage.
  • The ally gains resistance 6 to the triggering damage. After the damaging effect is applied, the enemy becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} until the end of its next turn.

Immortal.name: Immortal
Immortal.description: Shabti don't age naturally and can't die of old age. Spells and effects that cause aging still affect a shabti as normal. They also can't be turned into undead。

Shae.name: 无拘影民 Shae
Shae.speed: 迅疾步伐, 幽黯形态
Shae.publicNotes:
无拘影民是一种源生于阴影位面/影界，既飘忽不定又张力十足的生物。他们无定型的身躯看起来仿佛处于不断的流动中。他们不会投下自己的影子，而是会从附近的阴影中获得并失去幽影能量，这会使得周遭的影子随着影民一同收缩伸长。

大部分无拘影民身穿阴影纺成的衣服，这些衣服会随着他们的变化而变化，尽管外交官在招待外人时有时会穿着更常规的服装。他们最独特的服饰是白色的石头面具，他们只有在需要一张清晰可辨的“脸”来与类人生物和类似的东西互动时才会戴上这面具。无拘影民并不情愿这样做，因为他们认为自己比类人生物更优越，但戴上面具可以让别人更容易理解他们，这样他们与这些次等生物的互动就能尽可能地简短。

然而，一旦一个类人生物开始崇拜一名无拘影民，他们间的关系就会发生变化。一个凡人如果对无拘影民表示出应有的敬意，那么他就值得留在身边，因此许多无拘影民都收集了独尊他一人的异教团体或是数目庞大的随行人员。哪怕是和这样一位自视甚高的无拘影民会面都能构成一个挑战，想与其会面的人需要与许多衣食客打交道，他们坚持在浪费无拘影民的宝贵时间之前先由他们审查新人。

根据无拘影民的说法，他们已经超越了物质世界，如今的形态体现了现实与幻象在宇宙学（cosmological）上的平衡。他们宣称的形而上的飞升和对阴影秘密的了解，吸引了许多凡人恳求者加入无拘影民的组织和异教。在无拘影民的语言中，他们的名字意为“不受约束”，这与他们的信念相一致，即他们瞬息万变的本质让他们不受限于束缚着其他知觉生物的道德和社会约束的限制，而且无拘影民们基本上是以任性为美德。他们不觉得自己有什么义务去贯彻誓言或遵守法律，因此与凡人签订契约对他们来说意义不大。

Shadow Shift.name: 阴影位移 Shadow Shift
Shadow Shift.description: 因为自身一部分由阴影构成，无拘影民在昏暗或黑暗环境中处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态，哪怕对于那些能在昏暗或黑暗环境下视物的生物也是如此。

Counterattack.name: 反击 Counterattack
Counterattack.description:
触发 无拘影民被一个邻接生物的攻击选为目标，但这次攻击因为无拘影民的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态而未命中；

需求 无拘影民意识到这次攻击；

效果 无拘影民对攻击者进行一次打击。

Slip.name: 曳步 Slip
Slip.description:
触发 一个生物移动至邻接无拘影民的地方；

效果 无拘影民传送到30尺内他们能看见的另一个生物身旁的空地上。

Bide.name: 韬光养晦 Bide
Bide.description: 无拘影民准备对他们的敌人采取行动，观察他们的对手并等待合适的机会做出反应。无拘影民获得额外的第二个反应动作，但他们仍然不能在一次触发时使用超过一个反应动作。

Swift Steps.name: 迅疾步伐 Swift Steps
Swift Steps.description: 无拘影民的移动不触发反应动作。

Tenebral Form.name: 幽黯形态 Tenebral Form
Tenebral Form.description: 无拘影民在处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{气化形体 Gaseous Form}时能以全速飞行。

Shambler Troop.name: 蹒跚丧尸部队 Shambler Troop
Shambler Troop.publicNotes:
死灵法师们经常创造此类无心智的亡来作为其顺从而可消耗的仆人。如果任其自生自灭，丧尸只会吞噬活物，直至它腐烂的身躯再无法维持其形。

这群拖着脚步的烂肉迟钝但执着地向着目标前进。

yQzN4wExqO58Ssdr.name: 缓慢 Slow
yQzN4wExqO58Ssdr.description: 蹒跚丧尸部队永久具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}且无法使用反应动作。

Grave Tide.name: 亡灵之潮 Grave Tide
Grave Tide.description: 蹒跚丧尸部队比大部分部队都要缺乏组织性。它可以移动入其他生物占据的方格，其他生物也能移入它占据的。它占据的空间对其他生物而言视作困难地形。

Shambling Onslaught.name: 蹒跚猛攻 Shambling Onslaught
Shambling Onslaught.description:
1 到 2

频率 每轮一次

效果 蹒跚丧尸大肆攻击在它们占据的格子内或临接格子5尺的敌人（@Check[type:reflex|dc:18|basic:true]豁免）。伤害基于使用动作的数量。

1 [[/r (2d6+5)[bludgeoning]]]{2d6+5钝击伤害}

2 [[/r (2d6+9)[bludgeoning]]]{2d6+9钝击伤害}

Troop Movement.name: 部队移动 Troop Movement
Troop Movement.description: 当蹒跚丧尸部队行走时，它首先以一个自由动作重整队列，聚集成20尺*20尺方格的队列（减去任何损失的方格），然后以满速度移动。它在移动时如同一个巨形生物那般；举例来说，如果任何方格进入了困难地形，则整个部队都需要花费额外的移动力。

Shantak.name: Shantak
Shantak.publicNotes:
The imposing shantaks are far more intelligent than their bestial appearance would suggest. They can speak, though their voices sound like glass grinding on stone, and they can't converse in any language besides Aklo.

Shantaks' ability to travel through the gulfs of outer space at supernatural speed allows them to nest on numerous worlds, yet despite this mobility, most shantaks are reluctant to seek out new homes unless faced with no other option. Instead, they roost in discarded ruins or asteroids adrift in space, only emerging and landing upon planets in their chosen stellar system when the urge to feed compels them.

Despite not being native to the Dimension of Dreams, they're commonly found in that realm. Their ability to fly through space affords them swift travel between Leng and more hospitable reaches of the Dreamlands, making them particularly sought after as mounts for those who have business in the far reaches of the dreaming plane.

Convincing a shantak to become a mount is notoriously difficult. They refuse any sort of training, and even if one is convinced to ferry a humanoid on their back, they can be obstinate and fickle. Anyone relying on a shantak mount should have a backup plan ready in case the shantak strands their passenger on an asteroid or strange planet after some disagreement.

Although a shantak is nearly the size of an elephant, many possess irrational fears of certain creatures. In particular, nightgaunts terrify them, but other shantaks have been observed fleeing from harpies and gargoyles. Though these ancestries all share the same trait, shantaks don't fear every type of winged humanoid, which makes the origin of their phobia all the more mysterious. Shantaks on Golarion typically hide themselves away in remote places since several of the creatures they fear appear on the planet in abundance。

No Breath.name: No Breath
No Breath.description: The shantak doesn't breathe and is immune to effects that require breathing (such as an inhaled poison)。

Slippery.name: Slippery
Slippery.description:
The shantak's scales are covered in slippery slime, so the shantak gains a +3 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}.

A creature mounted on a shantak takes double the normal circumstance penalty to Reflex saves (-4 instead of -2 in most cases) while mounted。

Flying Strafe.name: Flying Strafe
Flying Strafe.description: The shantak Flies up to their fly speed and makes two claw Strikes at any point during that movement. Each Strike must target a different creature. The attacks take the normal multiple attack penalty。

Share Defenses.name: Share Defenses
Share Defenses.description:
需求 A creature is riding the shantak

效果 The shantak extends their no breath ability and cold resistance to a single creature riding them. They can withdraw this protection as a free action.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.zqgntQXIEbulBgZX]{效果: Share Defenses}

Shaukeen.name: Shaukeen
Shaukeen.publicNotes:
Perhaps the most perverse asuras of them all, shaukeens particularly delight in causing the downfall of those who give them succor, shelter, and most of all, schooling. Many a teacher has come across a shaukeen disguised as a small child of exceptional talents or curiosity and taken them under their wing, only to be beguiled into ruin. This diminutive asura's cleverness is disproportionate to their size; they ask probing questions and coax their prey into decisions that lead to heresy, furthering the collapse of order and decency. When the world turns on the shaukeen's mentor, the asura is gone-but not very far, for they love hiding unseen and watching the torment and destruction of their mentors.

Asuras are, above all, proof that the gods are not infallible. These fiends arose as physical manifestations of divine accidents, taking form when the gods themselves stumbled and blasphemed on a cosmic scale. As a result of their own divine genesis, an asura loves above all to undo the workings of the divine. They eagerly travel to the Material Plane, seeking out temples, congregations of faithful worshippers, and religious orders of all stripes to sow doubt and destroy what the gods seek to build。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The shaukeen takes on the appearance of a Small humanoid. This doesn't change the shaukeen's Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it might change the damage type their Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning). The asura typically loses their jaws and thorn Strikes unless the humanoid form has fangs or a similar unarmed attack.

This alternate form has a specific, persistent appearance, which the shaukeen can change by performing a 1-hour ritual.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Fire Jackal Saliva.name: Fire Jackal Saliva
Fire Jackal Saliva.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r (1d6)[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

Shikigami.name: 式神 Shikigami
Shikigami.publicNotes:
式神是所有神灵中力量最为弱小的，也是最常见的。不像大多数其他神灵，会被一个更强大的魂魄或神明约束在他们的护中。式神是一种即便是凡人修行者也能约束进小纸人形中的微小魂魄，并给予守护小事物的任务，例如花园雕像和花瓶。地主们喜欢让式神保护他们的花园，无论是付钱给流浪施法者来让他们呼唤式神，或只是简单地花钱让其他魂魄分配一个式神到他们土地上。穿过式神祝福的里程碑或路牌的旅者相信这样的遭遇对于前方的旅程来说是个好兆头。

就他们自身而言，式神对于文明和栖身于文明中的人形生物有着不同的看法。尽管式神会为了保护他们的护会与入侵者和亵渎者战斗，这些神灵在某些时候更倾向于离开——带着他们的护——如果当地人开始掠夺环境或对自然表露出漠视。大多数有能力约束式的修行者都不不会做出这种类型的失礼之举，不过如果神灵听说了这种事情，式神就会集体放弃契约，出人意料地跨越土地离开令他们不舒服的所在。在这种角度上，式神就是文明扩张与保护自然世界之间的危机平衡点。

不是所有的式神都需要保护花园，所以你可以用任何平凡的工具来替换掉式神的铲子，只要是对式神的任务和他们的护有所帮助。神灵持有的任何武器使用与他们的铲子打击相同的伤害骰，修正值，和特征，但是伤害类型会改变为与新武器相符合。

神灵是生于内海地区遥远东方，天夏之地的神性自然生物。他们守护着自然物体和地点——既他们的“护”（wards）——同时亦是鬼（Oni，见《Pathfinder Bestiary 2》）的远古死敌。神灵可以与他们的护融合，让他们暗中监视任何踏入其神圣之地者。神灵不会管那些他们认为的无害之人，但这些魂魄会警惕地战斗以吓跑任何被认为是威胁之人。

神灵会选择自己的护，因此凡人会试图吸引他们到需要保护的所在，例如一大片特定的树，雕像，门以及其他神灵广为人知会住进去的象征元素。

Ward.name: 护 Ward
Ward.description:
每个神灵都与一个护绑定：一个特定的动物，植物，物品或地点。一个神灵可以用一个具有专注特征的动作与他们的护融合或脱出。融合时，神灵可以用他们的常规感官也可以用护的感官来观察周围，但是不能移动，与护交流，或控制他们的护。此外，融合进护中的神灵每分钟完全恢复其HP如同他们花了一整天休息。

一个式神的护通常是一件小型的工艺品或文明的象征，例如里程碑，路标，私人花园或小雕像。

Shrine Skelm.name: 圣祠癫佬 Shrine Skelm
Shrine Skelm.publicNotes:
教会的绝对权力——一种甚至于可以干涉信众最为私人生活的影响力——那正是癫佬最渴望、最想要玩弄的东西。大部分圣祠癫佬都试图在有权势的宗教团体中取得审判官的地位，以获得能肆意使用的权力。无论圣祠癫佬们渗透进什么信仰，他们都会穿着古老的传统服饰，手握着由贵重属制成的圣徽，给人一种传统和权威的印象，以此更好地融入社会。

无论圣祠癫佬潜伏于哪一个教会，他们都很都擅长断章取义扭曲教理，为他们向受害者施加的繁复且痛苦、往往极具侮辱性的惩罚做出正当的解释。它的目标通常是那些敢于质疑他地位或教义的人，但也会毫不留情的对任何他嫉妒的对象下手。

圣祠癫佬是经验丰富的倾听者，尤其在集体祷告的场合，他们能知晓信徒所害怕或希望的事物。他们会利用知晓的信息来提升威望或攫取权力，但他们也散播嫉妒和愤怒的种子，这些种子可能会让人转化为新的癫佬。他们甚至可以拦截真诚的祷告并将效果窃取，并且用数种法术来操纵或控制那些被蒙在鼓里的脆弱受害者。

充满愤怒的癫佬会被吸引到任何人数过百的定居点。这些长着鹿角的怪物使用魔法伪装，利用社会规范为自己谋取利益，渴望获得别人对自己的恐惧和敬畏，并且残酷的惩罚那些胆敢反对他们的人，哪怕只是最轻微地反对。尽管癫佬本身非常危险，但在领导一群愤怒的暴徒时它们是最为致命的。他们残忍和榨取的本性让他们的名字成为了邪恶的代名词。

一个现存的癫佬可以把任何被愤怒冲昏头脑的邪恶人型生物变为自己的同类。作为一种教化的形式，癫佬让愤怒和羞耻在潜在的新同伴身上不断积累，同时让他们相信，某些组织和个体要为自己自己的痛苦和磨难负责。这种做法确保了当新癫佬自诞生时就有怀有强烈的复仇欲来策划报复行动。

许多新生的癫佬会继续以之前作为凡人时的生活；实际上，之前的身份往往决定了他们会成为什么类型的癫佬。癫佬在任何族裔中诞生，但是在那些性别观念死板、等级制度不公、无法以健康的方式宣泄愤怒情绪的社会中，癫佬会更加常见。

OwZj80arbVgN8YC9.name: 对抗情绪效果全豁免-1减值

Seize Prayer.name: 夺取祷文 Seize Prayer
Seize Prayer.description:
触发 圣祠癫佬听见30尺内有一个生物施放带有语言特征的神术。

效果 圣祠癫佬念出一段咒语尝试反制触发的法术（反制调整值[[/r 1d20+14 #Counteract]]{+14}，反制等级3级）。

如果成功反制法术，癫佬和施法者都会受到触发法术每环级[[/r (1d8)[mental]]]{1d8心灵伤害}，如果该法术有1个或多个目标，癫佬得知其效果并且可以允许该法术仅以癫佬自身为唯一目标生效（其他效果依然被反制）。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
圣祠癫佬可以变形成任何中型男性类人生物的外观。这不会改变他的速度或打击时的攻击和伤害加值，但可能会改变他打击的伤害类型。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Shulsaga.name: 银海牧者 Shulsaga
Shulsaga.publicNotes:
银海牧者是银海（Silver Sea）的放牧人，他们在星界中巡逻保护那些刚形成的新生半位面，抵御那些打算篡夺或掠夺半位面的存在。这种守护包括整个星界，因为银海牧者不但放逐入侵者，还积极寻找并关闭位面裂隙。尤其是一些令人震惊破坏把这些思诞族激怒到了主动出击的地步，他们的突袭小队经常把他们的攻击扩展到传送门另一侧的世界，以确保威胁被彻底摧毁。

虽然银海牧者通常严厉且冷漠，但偶尔会结识并招募陌生人来帮助他们修复位面裂隙，并追捕自然秩序的敌人。

在所有的思诞族中，银海牧者最爱收养和培育窃思灵云，组成小的家庭单位。社区共同努力，为这些窃思灵云灌输足够的文化和身份，让他们具有永久的身体——青少年银海牧者的形态。每个银海牧者的性别都反映出了他们不断演变的身份，部分受到他们的社区所传授的特征和他们自己的想法的影响。

星界是主位面的交汇点，将内环位面（Inner Sphere）和外环位面（Outer Sphere）连接起来，这是一个拥有无尽的银色物质的领域，斥着来自整个浩瀚众界（Great Beyond）的精神本质。星界里的大多数生物都是过客——试图从灵魂之河（River of Souls）偷猎的捕食者，防范此类入侵的招魂者，以及监控位面之间原始精华流向的御衡者。然而，这个位面本身产生了一些以奇怪电流和旋涡维生的生物，其中最重要的是由思想产生的生物族类，被称为思诞族。

思诞族在物理形态体现了它所代表的思想和目的。一些思诞族拥有相同的理想和目标，因此他们的形态也较为接近。

Rift Sense.name: 裂隙感知 Rift Sense
Rift Sense.description:
银海牧者能感知到1英里范围内的位面裂隙，包括天然传送门、像@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.U13bC0tNgrlHoeTK]{异界之门 Gate}这样持续生效的位面法术，或其他种类的现实裂口。

通过1分钟的专注行动，银海牧者能增加这种感官的范围至25英里。

Astral Recoil.name: 星界驱逐 Astral Recoil
Astral Recoil.description:
频率 每分钟一次

触发 银海牧者的最后一个动作是一次成功的近战打击，并且目标为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4Cntq9odgW6xMpAs]{星界投射 Astral Projection}仪式或类似效果所创造出的星界形态。

效果 银海牧者尝试反制将生物投射到星界的效果，效果等同于5环@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（反制调整值[[/r 1d20+18 #Counteract]]{+18}）。

Astral Shock.name: 星界震击 Astral Shock
Astral Shock.description: 一个意识被星界投射的生物，如果星界形态被银海牧者杀死，则在之后的强韧豁免中承受-2环境减值。

Disk Rider.name: 碟骑士 Disk Rider
Disk Rider.description:
银海牧者能骑乘在他们所创造出的任何@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LvezN4a3kYf1OHMg]{浮碟术 Floating Disk}之上。当骑乘浮碟时，银海牧者的飞行速度有+10尺增强加值，并且银海牧者能用脚挥舞浮碟作为重型盾牌（硬度5，HP 20，BT10）使用。

破损的浮碟不能提供速度加值，如果浮碟被摧毁则法术效果结束。

Hop On.name: 随上随下 Hop On
Hop On.description:
频率 每轮一次

需求 银海牧者和其创造出的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LvezN4a3kYf1OHMg]{浮碟术 Floating Disk}相邻；

效果 银海牧者进行一次快步，进入浮碟所在的空间，并且骑乘在浮碟上。它也能使用这个动作从浮碟上下来。

Silvanshee.name: Silvanshee
Silvanshee.publicNotes:
