Ravenspeaker.name: Ravenspeaker
Ravenspeaker.description: Valkyries use ravens as servants and spies. They can speak with ravens, and they can have up to three raven servitors who follow their commands. Valkyries can constantly observe whatever their commanded ravens sense。

Recall the Fallen.name: Recall the Fallen
Recall the Fallen.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 An allied creature within 60 feet who isn't a construct or undead is reduced to 0 Hit Points and their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying} value is 2 or less

效果 The valkyrie restores [[/r 5d10]] Hit Points to the target。

Storm of Battle.name: Storm of Battle
Storm of Battle.description: The valkyrie hurls her spear into the air, creating a massive storm in a @Template[type:burst|distance:100]. Spears of lightning rain down upon enemies in the area, dealing [[/r (4d12)[electricity]]]{4d12电击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:32|basic:true]豁免)。

Vanara Disciple.name: Vanara Disciple
Vanara Disciple.publicNotes:
Vanaras are monkey-like humanoids who dwell in treetop villages high in the canopies of lush jungles and verdant forests. Like the monkeys they resemble, vanaras manifest a wide variety of different fur colors, body types, and facial features, but they all have in common long, dexterous fingers and toes, as well as nimble and curious minds. Many of them learn to use their tails to capably manipulate objects.

Vanaras are a friendly people, but their boundless curiosity and love of pranks has a tendency to strain their relationships with other humanoids, and thus they usually make their homes far from urban areas. The majority of vanara settlements are found in southeastern Casmaron, among the lush jungles where they first originated. Devotion to monastic training and magical study has led to secondary populations forming in the Impossible Kingdom of Jalmeray, eastern Katapesh, and northeastern Nex. Nonetheless, young vanaras seized by wanderlust may roam far across the world, and travelers from many distant lands may in turn visit vanara communities in search of the wisdom of their elders and sages.

Vanara culture prizes order and discipline, leading to many vanaras studying monastic practices. They also value compassion, kindness, and community, whether that community is their own or one they're visiting. Most vanaras are quick to offer aid to those in distress and rarely hesitate in the face of evil, no matter the danger it presents. The leaders of vanara villages tend to be religious figures, or occasionally others possessing similar values and experience. Vanaras venerate Ragdya, the Sage of the Mountain, who encourages seeking enlightenment through worldly action and sees the virtues of pranks and humor。

Prehensile Tail.name: Prehensile Tail
Prehensile Tail.description: The vanara can use their long, flexible tail to perform Interact actions requiring a free hand, even if both hands are otherwise occupied. Their tail can't perform actions that require fingers or significant manual dexterity, including any action that would require a check to accomplish, and they can't use it to hold items。

Flurry of Blows.name: Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 The vanara disciple makes two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses。

Spring Up.name: Spring Up
Spring Up.description:
需求 The vanara disciple is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}

效果 The vanara Stands, then can immediately Step twice. The Stand action doesn't trigger reactions。

Vilderavn.name: Vilderavn
Vilderavn.publicNotes: In their true form, a vilderavn is a great raven with a wingspan of 6-8 feet. Adaptable shapeshifters, they can change to the fighting forms of a snarling wolf, a hybrid of both wolf and raven, and a tall humanoid in black armor with a massive greatsword. More sinister is their ability to assume a humanoid guise suited to insinuate themselves into the retinues of boastful mortal rulers. With historical knowledge and clever rumor-mongering, they goad the proud into squabbles, feuds, and ultimately wars. The vilderavn stays at the ruler's side until victory is within grasp, the war almost won, then exacts the cruel stroke of betrayal. Their magic turns the mortals against each other, and the vilderavn's sword falls swiftly。

Aura of Disquietude.name: Aura of Disquietude
Aura of Disquietude.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光} @Check[type:will|dc:35]

As Frightful Presence, plus a creature frightened by the aura becomes suspicious: it doesn't count any other creature as its ally and can't Aid or flank. On a critical failure, the creature also can't be a willing target for harmless or helpful magic.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.FrightfulPresence]

Bloodbird.name: Bloodbird
Bloodbird.description: A creature hit by a vilderavn's melee attack becomes cursed. It takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success] that's difficult to stanch. The DC to stop the bleeding using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} is 35, and healing the creature to full HP doesn't automatically end the bleeding. Removing the curse ends the bleeding。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description: The vilderavn takes on the appearance of a Small or Medium humanoid, wolf, dire wolf, or hybrid with both raven and wolf parts. The vilderavn can only use their jaws attack when in a form with a wolf's head, and their talon attack in a form with raven qualities. They can instead assume their raven knight form: a Medium humanoid in black full plate carrying a greatsword. They can use their jaws or talon Strikes only in a form that has that body part, and their greatsword only in knight form。

Souleater.name: Souleater
Souleater.description: If the vilderavn kills a humanoid target with a critical hit using their Jaws Strike, they rip out and devour the target's heart and soul as part of the attack. While the target is dead, the vilderavn can Change Shape into the target's form, gaining a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to impersonate the target. If magic would resurrect the creature, the caster must succeed at a DC 34 counteract check to extract the target's soul from the vilderavn; otherwise, the spell fails。

Vine Leshy.name: 藤蔓莱西 Vine Leshy
Vine Leshy.publicNotes:
难以压制的藤蔓莱西喜欢探索并分享故事。他们好奇心旺盛但不鲁莽。他们对其他文化非常感兴趣，可以在和同伴分享故事的时候迅速建立友谊。他们也像其他莱西一样，有一种保护欲。然而，藤蔓莱西往往只会在短暂的危险期对监护对象进行保护，之后他们的漫游欲望会驱使他们走向未知的世界。

莱西通常是自然魔法的实践者，它们是有知觉的植物类生物，保护着自然世界的森林、田野和其他环境中的神圣之地。莱西是自然的精魂，由原能仪式将它们融合在一具植物构成的身体中。

Verdant Burst.name: 翠绿爆发 Verdant Burst
Verdant Burst.description: 当莱西死亡时，身体会爆发出一阵原能能量，@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]范围内的每个植物类生物恢复[[/r (1d4)[healing]]]{1d4生命值}。该区域立即长满缠结的藤蔓，变为困难地形。如果该地形环境不适合藤蔓生长，则这些藤蔓会在24小时后枯萎。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
藤蔓莱西变形为一株小型藤蔓。此效果类似@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{树化术 Tree Shape}。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Extend Vines.name: 延长藤蔓 Extend Vines
Extend Vines.description: 藤蔓莱西用一个交互动作延长或缩短它的双臂。手臂延长时，藤蔓莱西有10尺触及。莱西无法用这种方式使用原本带有长触及特征的武器，因为这样无法保持平衡。

Viper Swarm.name: 蝰蛇群 Viper Swarm
Viper Swarm.publicNotes:
蝰蛇群包含大量闪亮鳞片、闪闪发光的眼睛和滴着毒液的毒牙，它带走了许多不幸的冒险者。蝰蛇群通常在夜间活动，这些以攻击性着称的蛇会攻击任何靠近的东西，无论是伸过来的肢体还是武器。它们的毒液毒性很强，会让受害者虚弱无力。

虽然蛇通常是独居动物，但有时也会成群聚集在一起。无论是聚集在洞穴深处取暖，还是聚集在陡峭的山坡上繁殖，还是通过魔法的方式达到不可理解的目的，这些滑行的集群生物都不应该被低估。

Venom Spritz.name: 毒液喷溅 Venom Spritz
Venom Spritz.description: 蝰蛇摆出防御姿态，从毒牙中喷射毒液。@Template[type:cone|distance:10]范围内的每个生物都暴露于辐射群毒液之下，但对抗毒素的豁免有+2环境加值。

Venomous Fangs.name: 毒牙 Venomous Fangs
Venomous Fangs.description: 集群占据空间内的每个敌人受到[[/r 2d8[piercing]]]{2d8穿刺伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true]豁免）外加蝰蛇群毒液。

Viper Swarm Venom.name: 蝰蛇群毒液 Viper Swarm Venom
Viper Swarm Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r (1d6)[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r (2d4)[poison]]]{2d4毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

Vishkanya Infiltrator.name: 蝮血裔渗透者 Vishkanya Infiltrator
Vishkanya Infiltrator.publicNotes:
从远处看去，蝮血裔和人类有许多相似之处。然而靠近观察就能够发现蝮血裔那宛如蛇类的双眼会呈现为金色或白色、舌尖分叉、皮肤上细小且光滑的鳞片排布成蜿蜒的图案。即便如此，大多数旁观者都会讲这些视为魔裔血脉或龙类魔法的特征，从不会认为他们所猜测的对象会是真正稀奇之物。

外界对蝮血裔血脉所知甚少，只知道蝮血裔的血液和唾液中含有强效毒素，这些知识引起了一知半解的恐惧和猜忌。为了避免被迫害，蝮血裔将扎根于自身选择的社会深处，训练诡秘技艺。为了从事能够更好地发挥自身技艺的工作，蝮血裔通常会担任间谍、佣兵、保镖、甚至刺客。部分闻名于世的行会会雇佣蝮血裔，这包括河域诸国匕痕城那成对的刺客行会与施毒者行会、无情的红螳螂刺客、以及那知名的为不可思议之国扎摩诔的侍臣服务的大萨雷特学会。大多数情况下，这些雇主知道手下雇员的真实身份，但并非总是如此。

由于必须采取措施来确保自身种族的存续，蝮血裔不会进行公开集会。他们会进行秘密会面，建立支援网络和咨询机构。主持这些会面的是最具威望的蝮血裔女性，她们会为了维持血脉和传统的活力而努力工作。这些地下社区发展缓慢，离开这些社区意味着放弃蝮血裔仅有的那一点点社会和文化的支持。因此，仅有少数蝮血裔会离开她们的乌笃剌（Vudran）家园，移民到内海地区或者其他大陆。

+2 status bonus on fortitude saves vs. p.name: 对抗毒素时强韧豁免+2状态加值

Envenom.name: 涂毒 Envenom
Envenom.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 蝮血裔使用血液或唾液来将蝮血毒应用至他正持用的1把武器上。要使用自身的血液，他必须已经受伤或者以该动作的一部分来对自身造成1点挥砍伤害。

Flexible.name: 柔韧 Flexible
Flexible.description: 蝮血裔渗透者擅长应对被拘束的情况。他们在逃脱的检定中获得+1环境加值。

Proficient Poisoner.name: 投毒专家 Proficient Poisoner
Proficient Poisoner.description: 蝮血裔渗透者不会由于打击大失败而失去武器上的毒素。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
蝮血裔渗透者对措手不及的生物造成1d6点额外精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Vishkanyan Venom.name: 蝮血毒 Vishkanyan Venom
Vishkanyan Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r (1d4)[poison]]]{1d4毒素伤害}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}和速度承受5尺减值 (1轮)

Vulpinal.name: Vulpinal
Vulpinal.publicNotes:
These celestial outsiders hail from Nirvana, the plane of purest good. Agathions are born from the souls of mortals who attained the enlightenment they sought in life, sometimes even after death. Because they all start out as mortals who were rewarded for their determination, self-awareness, and purity of heart, agathions are more likely than other celestials to intervene in working nonviolently against the spread of evil on the material plane. Agathions have served as moderators between the chaotic azatas and lawful archons, so they know how vital communication with mortals can be to bridge differences and ensure that evil doesn't win out.

All agathions possess animal-like aspects, some appear more anthropomorphic, while others spend most of their time in forms nearly indistinguishable from true animals. Still others prefer to shapeshift as they see fit, or present as humanoid when in the company of humanoid mortals.

Each type of agathion serves a specific role in Nirvana. Their duties and forms generally reflect the core values they cultivated in life that led them to their enlightenment. Since agathions receive their animal forms as rewards for their mortal lives, they take great insult with insinuations that they're merely magical talking beasts or-even worse-that their forms are a curse or punishment.

Vulpinals serve as the cunning and clever musicians and minstrels of the agathions. Incredibly far-ranging, these fox-like humanoids love traveling to learn and teach about all the unique songs, dances, myths, and traditions they can find. Though they prefer to travel alone, vulpinals are extremely gregarious toward those they meet on their journeys. They enjoy participating in the festivities of cultures they encounter, and they're known to form small traveling groups of like-minded individuals if they believe that their shared expertise can prove beneficial。

Fox's Cunning.name: Fox's Cunning
Fox's Cunning.description: A vulpinal's core value is cunning. They can apply their knowledge and stories from their extensive travels to just about any situation in an instant. Before spending any other action on their turn, the vulpinal can Recall Knowledge as a free action。

Water Wisp.name: 水微灵 Water Wisp
Water Wisp.publicNotes:
水微灵是泡沫和水组成的游动球体，持续地哼着柔和而绵长声调。他们温柔而乐于助人，并为需要帮助的人尽快提供帮助。

微灵是一些超小型的元素生物，它们在元素位面的创造中产生出来。。第一批微灵以不断变动的交响乐团漫游内环宇宙，它们在每次相遇时都会交换乐队成员。这些微灵的交响乐团通过他们总体的共鸣创造音乐，但是当邪恶的元素领主意识到微灵的共鸣的价值时，它们捕获了整个交响乐团作为它们的仆人。

微灵与彼此以及周围的人之间保持调和。这种调和使他们成为天生的善于帮助的盟友。自由的微灵仍在内环宇宙和物质位面中漫游，但它们通常很害羞，遇到陌生人时会躲起来。但是，他们很乐意为表达友善的人提供服务。它们尤其被练习元素魔法的施法者所吸引； 这些微灵一般会从处偷看，但偶尔会接近那些看起来挺安全，可以成为熟人或同志的人。

相遇的自由微灵会立即变得亲近。当发现元素与自己不同的微灵时，它们会尤其地兴奋，不会表现出某些元素那样对其他类型的敌意。。它们会兴奋地共舞，散发出恍惚间回响着那古老年代交响乐团的共鸣。

Mist Vision.name: 雾视 Mist Vision
Mist Vision.description: 水微灵忽略来自雾霭的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Accord Essence.name: 和声要义 Accord Essence
Accord Essence.description:
触发 30尺内，在过去一个小时内受到微灵共鸣的增益的盟友被一次攻击作为目标。

效果 微灵将自身引爆，造成小范围的元素爆炸，赋予@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺}内的，在过去一个小时内受到微灵共鸣增益的盟友获得等于元素当前生命值一半的临时生命。这些临时生命持续1小时。

使用该反应动作的微灵会被永久摧毁，并且仅能被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{祈愿术 Wish}或者类似的强力效果复原。如果某个能力会阻止微灵的毁灭（例如，该微灵是被召唤的，并因此只会被送回），和声要义不会产生效果。

Resonance.name: 共鸣 Resonance
Resonance.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

所有微灵都按照与它们的元素协调的频率振动，与所有具有该特征的生物和效果共鸣，并增强它们。

区域中的生物在具有水特征的效果上的攻击骰和伤害骰获得+1状态加值；具有元素和水特征的生物在所有攻击和伤害骰上获得该加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.1dwMVgBHfT4qO4OS]{效果: Resonance}

Drench.name: 灭火 Drench
Drench.description:
微灵扑灭五尺方格内的所有火焰。

这会熄灭该尺寸或者更小的非魔法火焰，并且会尝试反制魔法火焰（反制调整值[[/r 1d20+6 #Counteract]]{+6}）。

In Concert.name: 演奏中 In Concert
In Concert.description: 当微灵在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{协助 Aid}时骰出大失败，它们改为得到失败，并且当它们骰出成功，它们改为获得大成功。

Wayang Whisperblade.name: Wayang Whisperblade
Wayang Whisperblade.publicNotes:
In hushed tones, superstitious people tell their children stories of wayangs-living shadows who come out at night to eat misbehaving children. Mostly, these stories are just fictions of fearful minds, but it's true that wayangs were originally creatures of shadow, straddling the edge between light and darkness. The ancestors of modern day wayangs set out on a great exodus some 10,000 years ago, leaving their native Shadow Plane to seek out a new home. On Golarion, they found a great cataclysm had blocked out the sun behind a cloud of smoke and ash, enshrouding the planet in a seemingly endless night, and here they made their new home. When the light returned, wayangs retreated into what shadowy places they could find, avoiding contact with humans and other peoples of the light, who viewed the small, gaunt beings as suspicious reminders of difficult times.

Many wayang groups are nomadic, though many other groups have sedentary communities. Some live in homes carved out of natural caves, where they create works of art from stalagmites and other natural features. Others live in treetop villages in rain forests where sunlight barely penetrates the thick canopy of the forest. Wayangs are most populous in southeastern Tian Xia, especially in the archipelago of Minata, also known as the Wandering Isles, but their travels can sometimes take them to even further lands.

Despite their sinister reputation and secretive nature, wayangs are joyous creatures who tell stories and express their emotions through whisper-singing, dancing, and shadow puppetry, enhancing their performances with shadow magic. Similarly, they weave shadow magic into their deadly fighting styles, but wayangs are not a violent people, usually fighting only to protect what's theirs. Wayangs decorate their stringy hair with beads and their dusky skin with tattooed white dots that form pictures, with each picture silently telling stories about their family's history or their worship of various deities of shadow。

Shadowplay.name: Shadowplay
Shadowplay.description:
需求 The wayang's last action was a melee Strike that damaged their opponent

效果 The wayang attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} the opponent's space, with a +2 circumstance bonus to the Acrobatics check. If they succeed, the wayang leaves a shadowy afterimage in their original space, and the opponent is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against the next melee attack the wayang attempts against it before the end of their current turn。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The wayang deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Weasel.name: 黄鼠狼 Weasel
Weasel.publicNotes:
尽管黄鼠狼身材矮小，但它们是老练的猎手。它们几乎无所畏惧地追捕食物，能杀死比自己大五倍的生物。它们首选的策略是抓住受害者的后颈，然后用它们的下颚紧紧勒住目标的脖子直至目标死亡。 为了让自己吃饱，黄鼠狼会杀死比它们实际需要的还要多的生物，并将受害者塞进空心木头或空巢穴中以备后用。

学者们观察到黄鼠狼，无论是在野外还是在圈养环境中，都会在猎物面前表现出奇怪的行为。 它们出人意料地四处乱窜，扑倒在地，钻进钻出洞穴，而且通常表现得完全不理智。作为回应，它们的猎物会变得困惑或似乎陷入催眠，这让黄鼠狼有机会冲上前去进行致命一击。

典型的黄鼠狼长12英寸，重量不到一磅。

黄鼠狼是灵活而聪明的捕食者，以其美丽光滑的皮毛和钻入狭小空间的能力而闻名。很少有动物像黄鼠狼一样贪婪地进食。它们的饥饿感很难得到满足，每天几乎吃掉自己体重的一半的食物，导致它们一直需要寻找新的猎物来满足它们的饥饿感。

Lithe.name: 轻盈 Lithe
Lithe.description: 黄鼠狼能将仅有头那么宽的狭窄空间或缝隙视为困难地形，并且不需要@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{挤入空间 Squeeze}就能穿过它。

Werebat.name: Werebat
Werebat.publicNotes:
Werebats form organized colonies of opportunistic hunters. They aren't shy about transforming creatures to add to their colony, whom they initiate with elaborate social ceremonies and bloody hazing. The curse of the werebat gives them a strong urge to prey upon on weaker, lonely creatures. True werebats are often unusually tall and thin, with angular features. In combat, werebats favor their unarmed attacks because they can't fly while wielding weapons in their wings.

Werecreatures are humanoids who transform into animals and animal-humanoid hybrids under the light of the full moon. The fate of these shapechanging creatures derives from an ancient primal curse that they can, in turn, transmit through their own bites. The stat blocks in this section reflect werecreatures in their hybrid forms。

Echolocation (Precise) 40 feet.name: Echolocation (Precise) 40 feet
Echolocation (Precise) 40 feet.description: A werebat can use their hearing as a precise sense at the listed range。

Wing Thrash.name: Wing Thrash
Wing Thrash.description:
触发 An adjacent enemy damages the werebat

效果 The werebat makes one or two wing Strikes, each against a different adjacent creature。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
• Human
    • 近战 fist [[/r 1d20+10 #Fist]]{+10}/[[/r 1d20+5 #Fist]]{+5}/[[/r 1d20 #Fist]]{+0} (agile, nonlethal), 伤害 [[/r (1d4+2)[bludgeoning]]]{1d4+2钝击伤害}
    • 速度 25 feet
  • Giant Bat
    • 速度 15 feet, fly 30 feet

The werecreature changes into its humanoid, hybrid, or animal shape. Each shape has a specific, persistent appearance. A true werecreature's natural form is its hybrid shape.

In humanoid shape, the werecreature uses its original humanoid size, loses its jaws and claws Strikes, and gains a melee fist Strike that deals bludgeoning damage equal to the slashing damage dealt by its claw.

In animal shape, its Speed and size change to that of the animal, it gains any special Strike effects of the animal that it didn't already have (such as Grab), and it loses its weapon Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Curse of the Werebat.name: Curse of the Werebat
Curse of the Werebat.description:
This curse affects only humanoids.

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15]

On each full moon, the cursed creature must succeed at another Fortitude save or turn into a werecreature until dawn. The creature is under the GM's control and goes on a rampage for half the night before falling unconscious until dawn。

Moon Frenzy.name: Moon Frenzy
Moon Frenzy.description:
When a full moon appears in the night sky, the werecreature must enter hybrid form, can't Change Shape thereafter, becomes one size larger, increases its reach by 5 feet, and increases the damage of its jaws Strike (or a similar Strike) by 2. When the moon sets or the sun rises, the werecreature returns to humanoid form and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} for [[/br 2d4 #Fatigued duration]]{2d4 hours}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.dRe8n1nBWMIXd8jh]{效果: Moon Frenzy}

Werecrocodile.name: Werecrocodile
Werecrocodile.publicNotes:
The curse of the werecrocodile instills powerful hunger, urges violent displays of dominance, and amplifies greed.

Werecreatures are humanoids who transform into animals and animal-humanoid hybrids under the light of the full moon. The fate of these shapechanging creatures derives from an ancient primal curse that they can, in turn, transmit through their own bites. The stat blocks in this section reflect werecreatures in their hybrid forms。

Crocodile Empathy.name: Crocodile Empathy
Crocodile Empathy.description: A werecrocodile can communicate with alligators, caimans, and crocodiles。

Deep Breath.name: Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: A werecrocodile can hold their breath for about 2 hours。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
• Human
    • 近战 fist [[/r 1d20+10 #Fist]]{+10}/[[/r 1d20+5 #Fist]]{+5}/[[/r 1d20 #Fist]]{+0} (agile, nonlethal), 伤害 [[/r (1d4+2)[bludgeoning]]]{1d4+2钝击伤害}
  • Crocodile
    • 近战 jaws[[/r 1d20+10 #Jaws]]{+10}/[[/r 1d20+5 #Jaws]]{+5}/[[/r 1d20 #Jaws]]{+0}, 伤害 [[/r (2d6+4)[piercing]]]{2d6+4穿刺伤害}

The werecreature changes into its humanoid, hybrid, or animal shape. Each shape has a specific, persistent appearance. A true werecreature's natural form is its hybrid shape.

In humanoid shape, the werecreature uses its original humanoid size, loses its jaws and claws Strikes, and gains a melee fist Strike that deals bludgeoning damage equal to the slashing damage dealt by its claw.

In animal shape, its Speed and size change to that of the animal, it gains any special Strike effects of the animal that it didn't already have (such as Grab), and it loses its weapon Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Curse of the Werecrocodile.name: Curse of the Werecrocodile
Curse of the Werecrocodile.description:
This curse affects only humanoids.

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15]

On each full moon, the cursed creature must succeed at another Fortitude save or turn into a werecrocodile until dawn. The creature is under the GM's control and goes on a rampage for half the night before falling unconscious until dawn。

Moon Frenzy.name: Moon Frenzy
Moon Frenzy.description:
When a full moon appears in the night sky, the werecreature must enter hybrid form, can't Change Shape thereafter, becomes one size larger, increases its reach by 5 feet, and increases the damage of its jaws Strike (or a similar Strike) by 2. When the moon sets or the sun rises, the werecreature returns to humanoid form and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} for [[/br 2d4 #Fatigued duration]]{2d4 hours}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.dRe8n1nBWMIXd8jh]{效果: Moon Frenzy}

Twisting Thrash.name: Twisting Thrash
Twisting Thrash.description:
需求 The werecrocodile has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}

效果 The werecrocodile makes a Jaws Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll against the grabbed creature. If this Strike hits, it also knocks the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}. If it fails, the werecrocodile releases the target。

Wihsaak.name: Wihsaak
Wihsaak.publicNotes:
These gaunt and insectile sahkils torment their foes by focusing on a widespread fear of insects and creeping, crawling vermin. Unlike their more subtle cousins, wihsaaks don't lurk in the periphery and instead directly engage their targets, using their unnerving buzzing to disorient and terrify.

When encountering multiple foes, wihsaaks attempt to spread fear to everyone before slashing at them with their devastating claws.

Ages ago, when this cycle of the multiverse was still adolescent, a cabal of psychopomps who already felt bored and restrained in their role of ushering souls to their ultimate resting place rebelled against their station. It was this corruption of the cycle of souls that spawned the first sahkils.

Ambivalent to the prescribed order of the multiverse and spiteful of mortals, sahkils delight in spreading fear and unease to all beings, clogging up the metaphysical cycle with anxiety-ridden mortals too scared to achieve their potential. These fiends have drastically changed from their dedicated psychopomp predecessors. They are creatures of spite and torment, fear and disgust. They exploit the most common and rare fears for their own perverse satisfaction, and they want nothing more than to frighten mortals and make them quetion their reason for existence.

Most sahkils lurk on the Ethereal Plane, but they frequently invade the Material Plane to torment mortals and spread terror. They use their innate ability to slip between the veils of the Ethereal and Material effortlessly, often stalking their targets for days or weeks before enacting their devious plots。

Easy to Call.name: Easy to Call
Easy to Call.description: A wihsaak's level is considered 2 lower for the purpose of being conjured by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{Planar Binding} ritual (and potentially other rituals, at the GM's discretion), but it is always free to attack or leave instead of negotiate unless the primary caster's check is a critical success。

Swarmwalker.name: Swarmwalker
Swarmwalker.description: Swarms of animals and other unintelligent creatures instinctively leave a wihsaak alone. A wihsaak is immune to the damage from and effects of swarms with an Intelligence of -5。

Droning Distraction.name: Droning Distraction
Droning Distraction.description:
效果 The wihsaak beats its wings rapidly, creating a buzzing drone that numbs creatures' minds. Each creature within @Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100尺} must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:23] save. They are then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

成功 该生物不受影响。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

大失败 The creature is confused for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} for 1 minute。

Skip Between.name: Skip Between
Skip Between.description:
The wihsaak moves from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice-versa, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} except that the effect has an unlimited duration and can be Dismissed.

A summoned wihsaak can't use Skip Between。

Winter Hag.name: 冬鬼婆 Winter Hag
Winter Hag.publicNotes:
在漫长而黑暗的冬夜里，文明边缘地带的人们已经学会了警惕那些来敲门的老妇人。他们会观察雪中的踪迹和其他指示性记号，来确保她不会是打算将他们拖走然后享用他们骨头的冬鬼婆。

事实上，冬鬼婆是更狡猾的怪物，她会给人们设下圈套，会在一次抓走一两个居民前，在村庄内创造猜忌与不和，加剧剩余之人的恐惧和愤怒。当她完成计划时，冬鬼婆会享受没有炉火燃烧的冰封村庄的寂静。

鬼婆是外貌如同干瘦老妇的肮脏生物，她们与所威胁的类人生物没有丝毫共同之处。她们是憎恨的实体，最大的乐趣在于一切美好善良之物的腐化与最终毁灭。虽然创造出最初鬼婆的力量已经消失于时间长河，但随着时代变迁，有越来越多种鬼婆诞生，她们每一个都有着自己的力量与能力来散播痛苦与折磨。

Coven.name: 巫团 Coven
Coven.description:
冬鬼婆能将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{寒冰锥 Cone of Cold}，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.piMJO6aYeDJbrhEo]{重雾术 Solid Fog}，和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.R5FHRv7VqyRnxg2t]{冰墙术 Wall of Ice}添加到巫团法术中。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Coven]

Snow Vision.name: 雪地视域 Snow Vision
Snow Vision.description: 雪不会减弱冬鬼婆的视力；她忽视由降雪带来的带来的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealment}状态。

Craft Ice Staff.name: 制作冰法杖 Craft Ice Staff
Craft Ice Staff.description: 冬鬼婆可以花费1天举行一个特殊的仪式来制作一把黑冰材质的+1强击木杖。每天一次，她可以使用法杖施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{寒冰锥 Cone of Cold}。法杖的魔法只会在创造它的鬼婆手中起作用；对于其他人来说，这都只是一把普通的杖。如果鬼婆死亡或法杖被其他生物持有24小时，法杖就会融化成一滩恶臭的水。

Ice Climb.name: 冰面攀爬 Ice Climb
Ice Climb.description: 冬鬼婆可以使用列出的速度攀爬，但只能在冰面上。她忽视由冰和雪形成的困难地形，她在穿越冰面时不会有摔倒的风险。

Wizard Sponge.name: Wizard Sponge
Wizard Sponge.publicNotes:
This strange type of fungus colony takes its name from its initial purpose: the wizard who first developed it sought a means to keep her tower clean from residue both mundane and magical. Wizard sponge does just that, dutifully cleaning its vicinity by devouring dust, organic debris, and even the decaying bodies of fallen creatures. Its designer intentionally crafted the fungus to not merely resist but be healed by fire, intended as an additional safety feature, and most varieties have a convenient side effect of being edible once slain. Unfortunately, the fungus also developed an unexpected ability to magically mutate over time, which eventually led to its escape and independent propagation.

Wizard sponge colonies of various sizes and shapes now thrive in dungeons, caverns, sewers, abandoned castles, crypts, and even the basements of some occupied dwellings. They often carry along bits of partially consumed material with them, such as clothing, limbs, and adventuring gear-sometimes even valuable treasures! An individual colony typically takes on distinctive properties based on what it's consumed in its environment; a variety living in a necromancer's crypt might acquire the undead's affinity for negative energy, for example。

Fire Healing.name: Fire Healing
Fire Healing.description: Anytime a wizard sponge would take fire damage, it instead regains [[/r (1d8)[healing]]]{1d8生命值} (regardless of the amount of damage the fire effect would have caused)。

Suction.name: Suction
Suction.description: Wizard sponges can climb on ceilings and other inverted surfaces。

Swarming Slither.name: Swarming Slither
Swarming Slither.description: The wizard sponge slithers over each creature in its space, dealing [[/r (2d10)[acid]]]{2d10酸液伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true]豁免). A creature that critically fails is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

Weak Acid.name: Weak Acid
Weak Acid.description: Wizard sponge acid damages only organic material—not metal, stone, or other inorganic substances。

Wizard Sponge (Crypt).publicNotes:

Weak Acid.name: Weak Acid
Weak Acid.description: Wizard sponge acid damages only organic material—not metal, stone, or other inorganic substances。

Swarming Slither deals 1d10 acid damage and 1d10 poison damage. If this variety is eaten, it deals @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison1d6.success]。

Poisonous.name: Poisonous
Poisonous.description: If a creature eats this sponge, it deals @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison1d6.success]。

Fire Healing.name: Fire Healing

The sponge grows as an aquatic fungus, gaining a swim speed of 20 feet。

Weak Acid.name: Weak Acid
Weak Acid.description: Wizard sponge acid damages only organic material—not metal, stone, or other inorganic substances。

Wolliped.name: Wolliped
Wolliped.publicNotes:
Wollipeds are large, docile herd animals found in the snowy foothills of large mountains. Their eight legs give them sure footing even in icy terrain, and they grow thick, warm fleece as protection against the elements.

Arctic ranchers have been breeding wollipeds for hundreds of years, as the gentle creatures take well to domestication and make plentiful, hardy sources of meat, milk, and wool. The creatures also provide sure-footed transport in difficult mountain regions, and they can even be trained for plowing and hauling if necessary.

As a result of their widespread domestication, few are found in the wild. Young wollipeds have weak vision during their first few weeks and habitually follow any larger creature that walks by. Usually, these young wollipeds become attached their rancher or parents, but on occasion a few might follow large wild creatures and wander off from their herd. This has led to feral wollipeds around the Kodar mountains in Irrisen that are much more aggressive than their domesticated cousins.

Wollipeds are extremely sturdy, and their docile temperaments make them excellent mounts for those traveling mountain passes. Some mountain settlements have further trained their wollipeds to fight. Battle-ready wollipeds are formidable enemies that pose a threat to even the most experienced of challengers-but even untrained, wollipeds are not defenseless. In addition to their long tusks, they have developed spitting as a way of communication and assault, and readily regurgitate a mixture of stomach acid and the remnants of their last meal to deter predators.

Few on Golarion realize that these arctic beasts are not native to their world. Wollipeds originated on the planet Triaxus, a world with a magically enhanced eccentric orbit around the same star as Golarion. During the centuries-long Triaxian winters, wollipeds play an integral role in many communities as food, wool, transportation, and even a simple form of companionship. During the equally extended tropical summers, wollipeds retreat to the polar extremes of their world to await the return of the long snows。

Ice Stride.name: Ice Stride
Ice Stride.description: A wolliped isn't impeded by difficult terrain caused by snow or ice, nor does it need to attempt Acrobatics checks to keep from falling on slippery ice。

Regurgitated Wrath.name: Regurgitated Wrath
Regurgitated Wrath.description:
频率 每小时一次

效果 The wolliped regurgitates the contents of its stomach and spits them at the target, dealing [[/r (2d6)[bludgeoning]+(2d6)[acid]]]{2d6 bludgeoning damage and 2d6酸液伤害}. The target attempts a @Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true] save, and on a failure also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} on a critical failure)。

Wyrmwraith.name: 缚灵龙 Wyrmwraith
Wyrmwraith.publicNotes:
缚灵龙们源自那些拒绝接受死亡或荒谬地恐惧着来生的龙的灵魂。

尽管它们拒绝接受死亡，缚灵龙同样鄙视自己的新的不死形态。事实上，在失去了所有收集宝藏的动力后，缚灵龙转而执着于它们对所有活物（尤其是龙）乃至自身的憎恶。仅是缚灵龙的存在就足以使一片土地开始荒芜，直到缚灵龙的巢穴变成一个其他不死生物出没的死寂废土。

Positive Energy Transfer.name: 转嫁正能量 Positive Energy Transfer
Positive Energy Transfer.description:
触发 缚灵龙成功通过抵抗正能量伤害的豁免，但仍需承受伤害。

效果 缚灵龙将所有正能量伤害转嫁到一个120尺内它控制的、或对它态度为友好或乐于帮助的不死生物上。

Sunlight Powerlessness.name: 阳光失能 Sunlight Powerlessness
Sunlight Powerlessness.description: 位于阳光下的缚灵龙获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description: 缚灵龙释放一股负能量，对@Template[type:cone|distance:60]范围内的生物造成[[/r (18d6)[negative]]]{18d6负能量伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:38|basic:true]豁免），它在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法使用吐息武器。

Divine Dispelling.name: 驱除神术 Divine Dispelling
Divine Dispelling.description: 缚灵龙的爪抓能撕裂神术法术。每当缚灵龙用幽魂之爪打击击中了一个生物，它能进行一次宗教技能鉴定来反制此生物身上正在生效的神术法术效果。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 缚灵龙以任意顺序进行两次爪打击和一次啃咬打击。

Drain Life.name: 汲取生命 Drain Life
Drain Life.description: 当一条缚灵龙用幽魂之爪和幽魂之颚对一个活物造成伤害时，缚灵龙获得18点临时生命，受伤的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]鉴定否则获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}。缚灵龙的爪击和啃咬造成的进一步伤害在豁免失败时会使流失值加2，最高增加至流失4。

Ectoplasmic Form.name: 灵质形态 Ectoplasmic Form
Ectoplasmic Form.description: 一条缚灵龙可以穿过灵界帷幕，暂时以灵质构造的实体形态现世。缚灵龙在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内失去它的虚体特征，在那之前它们也可以一个自由动作变回虚体形态。一旦这个能力结束，缚灵龙在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法使用此能力。当它处于灵质形态，缚灵龙的AC增至43并获得100点临时生命。它失去对精准伤害的免疫和全部抗力。它的近战打击造成挥砍和穿刺而不是负能量伤害。

Phase Lurch.name: 灵界蹒跚 Phase Lurch
Phase Lurch.description:
需求 缚灵龙正处于灵质形态。

效果 如同行走动作，但是缚灵龙能像虚体生物一样穿过墙壁或者物理障碍。这次移动的起点和终点必须在任何实体障碍之外，且移动中通过固体材质视作通过困难地形。

Wyrwood Sneak.name: Wyrwood Sneak
Wyrwood Sneak.publicNotes:
Originally created as sapient magical servants, wyrwoods reclaimed the means to make more of their kind from their oppressive originators; now, they fiercely defend their freedom and autonomy. These small, nimble living machines rely on their wits and speed to evade foes and gather information. Most wyrwoods are precise and calculating, to the point that many outsiders perceive them as unfeeling, but they're also highly curious and passionate about matters that pique their interest. Regardless of personal agenda, wyrwoods prioritize the survival of their people above all else, even to the detriment of others when necessary.

Despite gaining their freedom, wyrwoods struggle to establish a home in Avistan. Some Avistani still view wyrwoods as tools of a secretive cabal, while others consider them traitorous servants who turned on their creators. Fearing for their safety, many wyrwoods fled the Inner Sea region to create a new home in Arcadia. In the coastal city of Segada, wyrwoods live in relative peace and safety, but they still prefer insular lifestyles.

Given their extreme self-reliance, wyrwoods have learned a degree of adaptability that far surpasses that of other cultures. When a wyrwood community finds itself in need of a specific skill or function, a member of the community-either a volunteer or one selected communally-takes it upon themself to learn the required abilities. They don't view any task as lesser or demeaning, as hubris is foreign to a wyrwood's construct nature.

A wyrwood's soul is tied to the magical stone that serves as their heart, which sometimes survives even when their construct body perishes. Another wyrwood might take the surviving heart from a close companion and incorporate it into their own body. In some cases, multiple wyrwoods might live on in a single body.

Wyrwood sneaks specialize in moving unseen behind enemy lines, performing reconnaissance and quietly eliminating threats。

Living Machine.name: Living Machine
Living Machine.description: Though their body is an organic construct, a wyrwood is a living creature. They're not immediately destroyed when reduced to 0 HP, but rather fall unconscious and eventually die. They don't need to eat or drink. They can be targeted by effects that target living creatures or that target constructs。

No Breath.name: No Breath
No Breath.description: A wyrwood doesn't breathe and is immune to effects that require breathing (such as an inhaled poison)。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The wyrwood deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures。

Ximtal.name: Ximtal
Ximtal.publicNotes:
The struggles of loneliness and the anxiety that accompanies that feeling plague many creatures, and ximtals delight in exploiting this fear for their own perverse gain. Appearing as hybrids of rats and crabs with grasping tentacles, these scheming fiends manipulate their victims over long spans of time, like pakalchis, to savor the most fear they can. Ximtals use subtlety to entrap their prey and often don't directly engage their targets. They use insecurities as a tool and force poor behavior in mortals they set their sights on. They prefer to focus their machinations on strong-willed and well‑intentioned mortals, hoping to erode their pride and self‑worth and ultimately lead them eschew altruistic efforts.

Rather than focusing on a single victim, a ximtal might instead seek out a particular cause of interest to the sahkil's appetites. These creatures often wander the multiverse seeking to sabotage societal crusades or suppress divergent ideologies.

While most ximtals work alone, they sometimes enlist the assistance of pakalchis, who share similar tastes in mortal fear. Together and focused, these two types of fiends can dissolve individual self-worth, relationships, and even entire organizations.

Ages ago, when this cycle of the multiverse was still adolescent, a cabal of psychopomps who already felt bored and restrained in their role of ushering souls to their ultimate resting place rebelled against their station. It was this corruption of the cycle of souls that spawned the first sahkils.

Ambivalent to the prescribed order of the multiverse and spiteful of mortals, sahkils delight in spreading fear and unease to all beings, clogging up the metaphysical cycle with anxiety-ridden mortals too scared to achieve their potential. These fiends have drastically changed from their dedicated psychopomp predecessors. They are creatures of spite and torment, fear and disgust. They exploit the most common and rare fears for their own perverse satisfaction, and they want nothing more than to frighten mortals and make them question their reason for existence.

Most sahkils lurk on the Ethereal Plane, but they frequently invade the Material Plane to torment mortals and spread terror. They use their innate ability to slip between the veils of the Ethereal and Material effortlessly, often stalking their targets for days or weeks before enacting their devious plots。

Easy to Call.name: Easy to Call
Easy to Call.description: A ximtal's level is considered 2 lower for the purpose of being conjured by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{Planar Binding} ritual (and potentially other rituals, at the GM's discretion), but it is always free to attack or leave instead of negotiate unless the primary caster's check is a critical success。

Despoiler.name: Despoiler
Despoiler.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:1000]{1000尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Creatures within the aura take a -2 circumstance penalty to all saving throws against poisons, diseases, and drugs.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.itdoXvcDo8wwmTME]{效果: Despoiler}

Isolate Foes.name: Isolate Foes
Isolate Foes.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The ximtal attempts to isolate its enemy's companions, forcing an impression that each creature's friends and allies have vanished and they are all alone against an insurmountable threat. The ximtal chooses up to four creatures, each of whom must be adjacent to one other target. Each target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:38] save. On a failure, a target becomes out of phase with all allies. The affected creatures can't perceive their allies or interact with them in any way, and they can move into allies' spaces as if their allies simply weren't there. Allies similarly can't perceive or interact with the affected creatures with one exception: an ally can target an affected creature with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse} to remove the effects. Every 24 hours, an affected creature can attempt a new saving throw to end this effect。

Sensory Fever.name: Sensory Fever
Sensory Fever.description:
A ximtal's withering attacks cause a debilitating disease targeting the senses

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]

Stage1 creature loses one sense determined randomly: taste, smell, hearing, or sight (1天)

阶段2 creature loses an additional sense from the stage 1 list (1天)

阶段3 creature loses an additional sense from the stage 1 list (1天)

阶段4 creature loses the last sense from the stage 1 list and any special senses, such as tremorsense or lifesense (1天)

阶段5 all lost senses are permanent unless restored via @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Restore Senses} or a similar effect。

Skip Between.name: Skip Between
Skip Between.description:
The ximtal moves from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice-versa, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} except that the effect has an unlimited duration and can be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismissed}.

A summoned ximtal can't use Skip Between。

Xiuh Couatl.name: Xiuh Couatl
Xiuh Couatl.publicNotes:
Fiercer than other couatls, xiuh couatls (pronounced "shoo") are dedicated to seeking out malevolent creatures and offering a final opportunity at redemption.

Couatls are serpentine celestials who tirelessly help mortals reach their greatest potential all across the planes. Some serve benevolent deities as intermediaries while others serve the cause of good as they see fit。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The xiuh couatl breaths a gout of flame and lightning in an @Template[type:line|distance:80] that deals [[/r (5d8)[electricity]]]{5d8电击伤害} and [[/r (5d8)[fire]]]{5d8火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:32|basic:true]豁免).

The xiuh couatl can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}。

Instrument of Retribution.name: Instrument of Retribution
Instrument of Retribution.description: The xiuh couatl transforms into any simple or martial weapon. The weapon is always a +2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.KCQRFvUgbyclvOGi]{Greater Striking} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{炽焰 Flaming} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock} weapon and can be of any size, chosen by the xiuh couatl when they transform. In weapon form, the xiuh couatl gains Hardness equal to that of the weapon into which they transform, and they retain their Hit Points, saving throws, senses, telepathy, and traits while in weapon form. The xiuh couatl can revert to their normal form by spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait。

Wrap in Coils.name: Wrap in Coils
Wrap in Coils.description:
需求 The xiuh couatl has a Medium or smaller creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} in their jaws.

效果 The xiuh couatl moves the creature into their coils, freeing their jaws to make attacks, then uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.g26YiEIfSHCpLocV]{Constrict} against the creature. The mix couatl can hold as many creatures in their coils as will fit in their space。

Xiuh Couatl Venom.name: Xiuh Couatl Venom
Xiuh Couatl Venom.description:
A xiuh couatl's poison deals good damage rather than poison damage to fiends

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r (2d8)[poison]]]{2d8毒素伤害} ([[/r (2d8)[good]]]{2d8善良伤害} to fiends) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r (2d10)[poison]]]{2d10毒素伤害} ([[/r (2d10)[good]]]{2d10善良伤害} to fiends), enfeebled 1, and -5-foot status penalty to all Speeds (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r (3d8)[poison]]]{3d8毒素伤害} ([[/r (3d8)[good]]]{3d8善良伤害} to fiends), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}, and -10-foot status penalty to all Speeds (1 round)。

Yithian.name: 伊斯人 Yithian
Yithian.languages: 20种其他语言, 心灵感应 100 尺
Yithian.publicNotes:
伊斯人是一种奇怪的生物，不过并不是因为他们的身躯，而是因为他们古老，超越躯壳的心智。作为一个民族，伊斯人将获取知识视作一切之上。他们将自己的心智越过宇宙投射而出，然后接管某个生物的躯体，生活在该生物的文明中，观察他们的文化。随后伊斯人会逆转这个过程返回他们的集体中，将他们学习到的一切记录在由奇怪的合金制成的巨著上。

伊斯人会抹除宿主被占据那段时间的记忆；然而这些宿主偶尔会回忆起奇怪的画面，通常是在梦中。这些回忆往往包括一座耸立着巨大黑塔的巨型城市，让观察者惊恐无比。只有少数的宿主会意识到这些模糊的记忆是他们在伊斯人的身体中，漫步于外星城市时。

四条灵活可伸缩的肢体从伊斯人锥形身躯的顶部辐射长出，其中两条末端是锋利的钳子，可以用夹击和挥动来交流，第三条末端则是一团漏斗形的感觉器官。一个有着三颗均匀分布眼睛的圆形“头部”长在第四条肢体的顶部。触手在这颗头部的下方摆动着，可以用来操作大钳子无法处理的事务，顶部升起的触手冠就像奇怪的花朵一样，承担着耳朵的功能。

20 Other Languages.name: 20 Other Languages
20 Other Languages.description: 伊斯人能够读写20种其他语言。

c2528fH4caBbtkGp.name: 思维感知 (模糊感官) 60 尺
c2528fH4caBbtkGp.description: 伊斯人能感知到所列范围内所有非无心智生物。

Mind Swap.name: 心智交换 Mind Swap
Mind Swap.description: 当伊斯人成功施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{占据术 Possession}，他与目标交换心智与灵魂。两者控制对方的身体。该效果持续到伊斯人@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{解消 Dismisses}法术或因其他效果结束占据术而被强制驱离。当效果结束时，每个生物的心智与灵魂返回自身的身体，无视物理或时间距离，伊斯人可以对目标施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.FhOaQDTSnsY7tiam]{修改记忆 Modify Memory}，移除任意或所有被占据时间的知识。如果伊斯人因为某个效果而被强制驱离目标的心智，伊斯人不能移除这些知识。

Young Forest Dragon.name: 青年森龙 Young Forest Dragon
Young Forest Dragon.publicNotes:
森龙监督着自然的无穷生长，保护它免受掠夺和过渡开垦为荒地。有人说这些龙自己自私地囤积着自然的馈赠，将其他试图想要从自然中获益的人视作贼人和偷猎者。他们厌恶科技和文明的进步，更喜欢与怪物和动物为伍。

森龙从字面意义上便如同森林。随着时间推移，他们的毛发变成了青苔，他们的外皮坚硬地像树皮，还有小型的昆虫和动物栖息其间。

帝龙，得名于龙帝国（the Dragon Empires），是人形种族到来之前的天夏（Tian Xia）守护者，五种强大而对的立力量的具现。与其他真龙不同，帝龙深度参与着人类事务。其中一些依然维持神秘感，装作隐士，而另一些则保持高调，公开统治着某些势力。天夏的文化也相应地崇敬着龙，将龙描绘成神明，或则他们的先祖。但不是所有龙都被崇拜，因为这些生物大多数都行事邪恶。

龙之五行 Draconic Cycles

五种元素是帝龙魔力的基石，影响着他们与一切事物的关系，特别是与他们之中不同种类的关系。这些元素以两个循环相互联系。第一个循环中，每个元素两两相生：木生火，火生土，土生金，金生水，水生木。第二个循环中，则两两相克：木克土，土克水，水克火，火克金，金克木。

每种帝龙都代表着一种元素，并拥有四种与相生相克有关的能力。比如，森龙——与木相通——生火，由水所生，克土，为金所克。

Countered by Metal.name: 为金所克 Countered by Metal
Countered by Metal.description: 如果森龙受到来自金属物品的伤害，他们将失去林地穿行和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zlnXpME1T2uvn8Lr]{行踪无迹 Pass Without Trace}的效果，直到他们下个回合结束。

Fed by Water.name: 由水而生 Fed by Water
Fed by Water.description:
频率 每小时一次

触发 森龙成为一次水法术或效果的目标。

效果 森龙获得[[/r 30 #Temporary Hit Points]]{30临时生命值}。

Frightful Presence.name: 气势凶猛 Frightful Presence
Frightful Presence.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:90]{90尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光} @Check[type:will|dc:27]

动物，真菌和植物在豁免时承受-2环境减值。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.FrightfulPresence]

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
龙放出一群昆虫对@Template[type:cone|distance:30]范围造成[[/r (10d6)[piercing]]]{10d6穿刺伤害}(@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]豁免)，随后消散开来。

豁免大失败的生物将因昆虫的毒液陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}，这是一种毒素效果。

龙不能在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}内再次使用吐息。

Woodland Stride.name: 穿林步 Woodland Stride
Woodland Stride.description: 森龙忽视由非魔法植物形成的困难地形和高等困难地形。

Coiling Frenzy.name: 盘绕狂暴 Coiling Frenzy
Coiling Frenzy.description: 龙以任意顺序进行一次爪抓和尾击打击，两次打击须选择相同目标。如果任意打击命中，龙自动@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabs}目标。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

Young Forest Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 青年森龙施法者 Young Forest Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Forest Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
森龙监督着自然的无穷生长，保护它免受掠夺和过渡开垦为荒地。有人说这些龙自己自私地囤积着自然的馈赠，将其他试图想要从自然中获益的人视作贼人和偷猎者。他们厌恶科技和文明的进步，更喜欢与怪物和动物为伍。

Countered by Metal.name: 为金所克 Countered by Metal
Countered by Metal.description: 如果森龙受到来自金属物品的伤害，他们将失去林地穿行和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zlnXpME1T2uvn8Lr]{行踪无迹 Pass Without Trace}的效果，直到他们下个回合结束。

Fed by Water.name: 由水而生 Fed by Water
Fed by Water.description:
频率 每小时一次

触发 森龙成为一次水法术或效果的目标。

效果 森龙获得[[/r 30 #Temporary Hit Points]]{30临时生命值}。

Frightful Presence.name: 气势凶猛 Frightful Presence
Frightful Presence.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:90]{90尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光} @Check[type:will|dc:27]

动物，真菌和植物在豁免时承受-2环境减值。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.FrightfulPresence]

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
龙放出一群昆虫对@Template[type:cone|distance:30]范围造成[[/r (10d6)[piercing]]]{10d6穿刺伤害}(@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]豁免)，随后消散开来。

豁免大失败的生物将因昆虫的毒液陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}，这是一种毒素效果。

龙不能在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}内再次使用吐息。

Woodland Stride.name: 穿林步 Woodland Stride
Woodland Stride.description: 森龙忽视由非魔法植物形成的困难地形和高等困难地形。

Young Sea Dragon.name: 青年海龙 Young Sea Dragon
Young Sea Dragon.publicNotes:
海龙与水的亲和力使得他们能够掌握雨，风暴和洪水。那些生活在需要仰赖天气和波涛地区的人们崇敬这些伟大的水生生物。大多数海龙都会友好地回应请求，但是，就与大海一样，他们是不可预测且善变的。

海龙有着如同鱼类一样的碟状鳞片，长蹼的爪子和同样巨大的背鳍尾鳍可以利于游泳。他们有着鲜艳醒目的颜色，就如同水生动物那样。上了年纪的海龙身上还会长有底栖动植物，古老海龙的角周围经常会附着着满头珊瑚，宛若加冕。

帝龙，得名于龙帝国（the Dragon Empires），是人形种族到来之前的天夏（Tian Xia）守护者，五种强大而对的立力量的具现。与其他真龙不同，帝龙深度参与着人类事务。其中一些依然维持神秘感，装作隐士，而另一些则保持高调，公开统治着某些势力。天夏的文化也相应地崇敬着龙，将龙描绘成神明，或则他们的先祖。但不是所有龙都被崇拜，因为这些生物大多数都行事邪恶。

龙之五行 Draconic Cycles

五种元素是帝龙魔力的基石，影响着他们与一切事物的关系，特别是与他们之中不同种类的关系。这些元素以两个循环相互联系。第一个循环中，每个元素两两相生：木生火，火生土，土生金，金生水，水生木。第二个循环中，则两两相克：木克土，土克水，水克火，火克金，金克木。

每种帝龙都代表着一种元素，并拥有四种与相生相克有关的能力。比如，森龙——与木相通——生火，由水所生，克土，为金所克。

Coiling Frenzy.name: 盘绕狂暴 Coiling Frenzy
Coiling Frenzy.description: 龙以任意顺序进行一次爪抓和尾击打击，两次打击须选择相同目标。如果任意打击命中，龙自动@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabs}目标。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

Countered by Earth.name: 为土所克 Countered by Earth
Countered by Earth.description: 如果海龙成为土法术或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{石化术 Flesh to Stone}的目标，他们将失去液化直到他们下个回合结束。

Fed by Metal.name: 由金所生 Fed by Metal
Fed by Metal.description:
当海龙被主要由金属制成的武器击中，或被使用金属的法术影响时，海龙的大部分鳞片会变得如同金属一样。这将给予龙在AC上+1物品加值直到他们下个回合开始。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.OMJnZspk5YHai8yn]{效果: 由金所生}

Liquefy.name: 液化 Liquefy
Liquefy.description:
触发 龙成为可以造成火焰或物理伤害之打击或法术的目标。

效果 龙会液化，一瞬间在保持形态的同时完全变成水。针对触发效果，它们在对抗火焰和所有物理伤害上获得15抗力。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
龙向40尺内射出一个对@Template[type:burst|distance:20]范围造成[[/r (9d6)[bludgeoning]]]{9d6钝击伤害}的水球(@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true]豁免)，熄灭半径内所有非魔法火焰。

龙不能在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}内再次使用吐息。

Hyponatremia.name: 低血钠症 Hyponatremia
Hyponatremia.description: 一个受到海龙颚咬打击伤害的活着的生物必须成功通过一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]否则会因为体内激增的水量而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

Young Sea Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 青年海龙施法者 Young Sea Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Sea Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
海龙与水的亲和力使得他们能够掌握雨，风暴和洪水。那些生活在需要仰赖天气和波涛地区的人们崇敬这些伟大的水生生物。大多数海龙都会友好地回应请求，但是，就与大海一样，他们是不可预测且善变的。

海龙有着如同鱼类一样的碟状鳞片，长蹼的爪子和同样巨大的背鳍尾鳍可以利于游泳。他们有着鲜艳醒目的颜色，就如同水生动物那样。上了年纪的海龙身上还会长有底栖动植物，古老海龙的角周围经常会附着着满头珊瑚，宛若加冕。

帝龙，得名于龙帝国（the Dragon Empires），是人形种族到来之前的天夏（Tian Xia）守护者，五种强大而对的立力量的具现。与其他真龙不同，帝龙深度参与着人类事务。其中一些依然维持神秘感，装作隐士，而另一些则保持高调，公开统治着某些势力。天夏的文化也相应地崇敬着龙，将龙描绘成神明，或则他们的先祖。但不是所有龙都被崇拜，因为这些生物大多数都行事邪恶。

龙之五行 Draconic Cycles

五种元素是帝龙魔力的基石，影响着他们与一切事物的关系，特别是与他们之中不同种类的关系。这些元素以两个循环相互联系。第一个循环中，每个元素两两相生：木生火，火生土，土生金，金生水，水生木。第二个循环中，则两两相克：木克土，土克水，水克火，火克金，金克木。

每种帝龙都代表着一种元素，并拥有四种与相生相克有关的能力。比如，森龙——与木相通——生火，由水所生，克土，为金所克。

Countered by Earth.name: 为土所克 Countered by Earth
Countered by Earth.description: 如果海龙成为土法术或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{石化术 Flesh to Stone}的目标，他们将失去液化直到他们下个回合结束。

Fed by Metal.name: 由金所生 Fed by Metal
Fed by Metal.description:
当海龙被主要由金属制成的武器击中，或被使用金属的法术影响时，海龙的大部分鳞片会变得如同金属一样。这将给予龙在AC上+1物品加值直到他们下个回合开始。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.OMJnZspk5YHai8yn]{效果: 由金所生}

Liquefy.name: 液化 Liquefy
Liquefy.description:
触发 龙成为可以造成火焰或物理伤害之打击或法术的目标。

效果 龙会液化，一瞬间在保持形态的同时完全变成水。针对触发效果，它们在对抗火焰和所有物理伤害上获得15抗力。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
龙向40尺内射出一个对@Template[type:burst|distance:20]范围造成[[/r (9d6)[bludgeoning]]]{9d6钝击伤害}的水球(@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true]豁免)，熄灭半径内所有非魔法火焰。

龙不能在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}内再次使用吐息。

Hyponatremia.name: 低血钠症 Hyponatremia
Hyponatremia.description: 一个受到海龙颚咬打击伤害的活着的生物必须成功通过一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]否则会因为体内激增的水量而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

Young Sky Dragon.name: 青年天龙 Young Sky Dragon
Young Sky Dragon.publicNotes:
天龙生活在靠近山巅的云端之上。他们维持着强烈的宗教传统，这种在帝龙中都算得上独特的习俗让他们远离其他龙亦如同他们远离尘世。绝望的灵魂们越过陡峭的悬崖和皑皑的积雪以寻求龙的告诫，大多数天龙很乐意帮助那些完成历险的人们，但他们也会毫不犹豫地驱逐任何抱有敌意与纠缠不休之人。

天龙之翼并不是真正的翅膀，更像是前臂上修长的鳍。他们的鳞片也生长缓慢。年轻的龙会紧绕在巢穴里来吸收矿物质，以使得鳞片变得坚硬与鲜艳。即便是成年龙也保持着卷着柱子的习惯。

帝龙，得名于龙帝国（the Dragon Empires），是人形种族到来之前的天夏（Tian Xia）守护者，五种强大而对的立力量的具现。与其他真龙不同，帝龙深度参与着人类事务。其中一些依然维持神秘感，装作隐士，而另一些则保持高调，公开统治着某些势力。天夏的文化也相应地崇敬着龙，将龙描绘成神明，或则他们的先祖。但不是所有龙都被崇拜，因为这些生物大多数都行事邪恶。

龙之五行 Draconic Cycles

五种元素是帝龙魔力的基石，影响着他们与一切事物的关系，特别是与他们之中不同种类的关系。这些元素以两个循环相互联系。第一个循环中，每个元素两两相生：木生火，火生土，土生金，金生水，水生木。第二个循环中，则两两相克：木克土，土克水，水克火，火克金，金克木。

每种帝龙都代表着一种元素，并拥有四种与相生相克有关的能力。比如，森龙——与木相通——生火，由水所生，克土，为金所克。

PO5OyKjxeT0rYaYl.name: 啃咬 Jaws
PO5OyKjxeT0rYaYl.description: 未为火所克时还造成1d12电击伤害。

Mist Vision.name: 雾视 Mist Vision
Mist Vision.description: 雾与浓雾不会削弱天龙的视觉；他们忽视由雾带来的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Countered by Fire.name: 为火所克 Countered by Fire
Countered by Fire.description:
如果天龙受到火焰伤害，他们体内的金属相魔法会被中和。直到下个他们回合结束，他们在攻击骰和AC上承受-1环境修正，且他们的颚咬攻击不再造成电击伤害。如果龙使用了吐息则限制结束。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.a4bZrBNL17zPjDiH]{效果: 为火所克}

Fed by Earth.name: 由土而生 Fed by Earth
Fed by Earth.description: 如果天龙成为土法术或效果的目标，他们会在飞行轨迹上留下一团旋转的砂石云。持续1分钟，龙在飞行时获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
龙向40尺内射出一个对@Template[type:burst|distance:20]范围造成[[/r (5d12)[electricity]]]{5d12电击伤害}的电球(@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免)。

龙不能在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}内再次使用吐息。

Perfected Flight.name: 完美飞行 Perfected Flight
Perfected Flight.description: 天龙可以不花任何行动在一处盘旋，并且他们在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Qf1ylAbdVi1rkc8M]{空中机动 Maneuver in Flight}上的所有特技检定自动成功。

Coiling Frenzy.name: 盘绕狂暴 Coiling Frenzy
Coiling Frenzy.description: 龙以任意顺序进行一次爪抓和尾击打击，两次打击须选择相同目标。如果任意打击命中，龙自动@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabs}目标。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

Young Sky Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 青年天龙施法者 Young Sky Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Sky Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
天龙生活在靠近山巅的云端之上。他们维持着强烈的宗教传统，这种在帝龙中都算得上独特的习俗让他们远离其他龙亦如同他们远离尘世。绝望的灵魂们越过陡峭的悬崖和皑皑的积雪以寻求龙的告诫，大多数天龙很乐意帮助那些完成历险的人们，但他们也会毫不犹豫地驱逐任何抱有敌意与纠缠不休之人。

Breath Weapon.description:
龙向40尺内射出一个对@Template[type:burst|distance:20]范围造成[[/r (5d12)[electricity]]]{5d12电击伤害}的电球(@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免)。

Perfected Flight.name: 完美飞行 Perfected Flight
Perfected Flight.description: 天龙可以不花任何行动在一处盘旋，并且他们在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Qf1ylAbdVi1rkc8M]{空中机动 Maneuver in Flight}上的所有特技检定自动成功。

Young Sovereign Dragon.name: 青年君龙 Young Sovereign Dragon
Young Sovereign Dragon.publicNotes:
由于他们深入到凡人中，君龙是帝龙中最广为人知的一种，君龙的名字便来自于他们选任君主之行——不过有些时候，君龙自己也会加入候选人名单。其他帝龙怀疑君龙献祭了自身的五行之能以获得禁忌的魔法，证据就是尽管它们是代表土属相的生物，但缺乏被木克制的弱点和由火而生的能力。

君龙的权威毫无疑虑。虽然有一些人欣赏他们公正的天性，但余下的人也会指责这种对中立的坚持。无论如何，君龙的魅力和长达数个世纪的微操经验，让他们成为杰出的谈判者。

几乎所有君龙都是金色的。他们的毛发涵盖了人类中最常见的颜色到明亮的红色，绿色和蓝色。他们是唯一一种每只爪子都有五趾的龙，这是一个有着重要地位的标志。其他帝龙反对这种地位上的主张，反而嘲笑君龙哪怕是在龙形态时也有穿着盔甲的需要。

帝龙，得名于龙帝国（the Dragon Empires），是人形种族到来之前的天夏（Tian Xia）守护者，五种强大而对的立力量的具现。与其他真龙不同，帝龙深度参与着人类事务。其中一些依然维持神秘感，装作隐士，而另一些则保持高调，公开统治着某些势力。天夏的文化也相应地崇敬着龙，将龙描绘成神明，或则他们的先祖。但不是所有龙都被崇拜，因为这些生物大多数都行事邪恶。

龙之五行 Draconic Cycles

五种元素是帝龙魔力的基石，影响着他们与一切事物的关系，特别是与他们之中不同种类的关系。这些元素以两个循环相互联系。第一个循环中，每个元素两两相生：木生火，火生土，土生金，金生水，水生木。第二个循环中，则两两相克：木克土，土克水，水克火，火克金，金克木。

每种帝龙都代表着一种元素，并拥有四种与相生相克有关的能力。比如，森龙——与木相通——生火，由水所生，克土，为金所克。

Violent Retort.name: 以牙还牙 Violent Retort
Violent Retort.description:
触发 一个君龙触及范围内的生物对龙造成了重击.

效果 在结算了对龙的所有重击效果之后，君龙对该生物进行一次爪抓或尾击打击。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
龙释放一道充满精神能量的吼叫，对@Template[type:cone|distance:30]范围造成[[/r (12d6)[mental]]]{12d6心灵伤害}(@Check[type:will|dc:30|basic:true]豁免)。

龙不能在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}内再次使用吐息。

Gleaming Armor.name: 耀目宝甲 Gleaming Armor
Gleaming Armor.description:
频率 每小时一次

效果 龙的黄金铠甲散发着保护性的金色光芒。龙在AC上获得+2状态修正以及抗力10以对抗能量伤害。@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]以内的敌人都必须成功通过一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:30]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}状态。

所有这些效果都将持续到龙的下个回合结束。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.CoPPOCyfADvybcxV]{效果: 耀目宝甲}

Coiling Frenzy.name: 盘绕狂暴 Coiling Frenzy
Coiling Frenzy.description: 龙以任意顺序进行一次爪抓和尾击打击，两次打击须选择相同目标。如果任意打击命中，龙自动@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabs}目标。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.CoPPOCyfADvybcxV]{效果: 耀目宝甲}

Young Underworld Dragon.name: 青年伏藏龙 Young Underworld Dragon
Young Underworld Dragon.publicNotes:
伏藏龙体现着构造板块间的压力，热泉后的热力，和世界成型时点燃的火光。作为天生的炼金术师，他们与生俱来就了解反应物和催化剂。虽然有些龙在研究金属反应中魔法的影响，但大多数伏藏龙都专心囤积财宝。他们满世界寻找切割过的宝石和用珍贵金属制作的神器，这两者他们都视作大地馈赠的精华所在。

伏藏龙看上去粗犷而锋利；他们的鳞片发着光仿若内部过热，他们的毛发摇曳着如同火舌。他们的目光后有着强烈的火焰燃烧，暗示着他们一个念头即可燃物，他们的呼吸让空气产生涟漪即是他们体内蕴含热量的最好证明。

帝龙，得名于龙帝国（the Dragon Empires），是人形种族到来之前的天夏（Tian Xia）守护者，五种强大而对的立力量的具现。与其他真龙不同，帝龙深度参与着人类事务。其中一些依然维持神秘感，装作隐士，而另一些则保持高调，公开统治着某些势力。天夏的文化也相应地崇敬着龙，将龙描绘成神明，或则他们的先祖。但不是所有龙都被崇拜，因为这些生物大多数都行事邪恶。

龙之五行 Draconic Cycles

五种元素是帝龙魔力的基石，影响着他们与一切事物的关系，特别是与他们之中不同种类的关系。这些元素以两个循环相互联系。第一个循环中，每个元素两两相生：木生火，火生土，土生金，金生水，水生木。第二个循环中，则两两相克：木克土，土克水，水克火，火克金，金克木。

每种帝龙都代表着一种元素，并拥有四种与相生相克有关的能力。比如，森龙——与木相通——生火，由水所生，克土，为金所克。

STN5ZaMm14HJIg38.name: 啃咬 Jaws
STN5ZaMm14HJIg38.description: 未为水所克时还造成1d6火焰伤害。

Smoke Vision.name: 烟视 Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: 烟不会削弱伏藏龙的视觉；他们忽视由烟带来的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Countered by Water.name: 为水所克 Countered by Water
Countered by Water.description:
如果伏藏龙受到了具有寒冷或水特征法术的伤害，他们体内的火属相魔法将被暂时抑制。

直到他们下个回合结束，他们攻击骰承受-1环境惩罚，他们的颚咬攻击不再造成火焰伤害.

如果龙使用了吐息则限制结束。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.81XYZZ3H0GL8thdQ]{效果: 为水所克}

Fed by Wood.name: 由木所生 Fed by Wood
Fed by Wood.description:
当伏藏龙被一个木制武器攻击或被带有植物特征的法术影响，龙内在的火焰本质将因获得燃料而旺盛。他们的吐息获得充能，龙的颚咬附带的火焰伤害增加一个伤害骰直到龙的下个回合结束。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.4FMFRlEC923CnLI7]{效果: 由木所生}

Adamantine Claws.name: 精金爪 Adamantine Claws
Adamantine Claws.description: 龙的爪子中灌入了精金。他们的爪抓打击忽略物体一半的硬度。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
龙向40尺内射出一个对@Template[type:burst|distance:20]范围造成[[/r (7d6)[fire]]]{7d6火焰伤害}的火球(@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true]豁免)。豁免失败的生物还将受到@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Fire1d6.success]。

龙不能在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}内再次使用吐息。

Coiling Frenzy.name: 盘绕狂暴 Coiling Frenzy
Coiling Frenzy.description: 龙以任意顺序进行一次爪抓和尾击打击，两次打击须选择相同目标。如果任意打击命中，龙自动@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabs}目标。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

Young Underworld Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 青年伏藏龙施法者 Young Underworld Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Underworld Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
伏藏龙体现着构造板块间的压力，热泉后的热力，和世界成型时点燃的火光。作为天生的炼金术师，他们与生俱来就了解反应物和催化剂。虽然有些龙在研究金属反应中魔法的影响，但大多数伏藏龙都专心囤积财宝。他们满世界寻找切割过的宝石和用珍贵金属制作的神器，这两者他们都视作大地馈赠的精华所在。

STN5ZaMm14HJIg38.description: 未为水所克时还造成1d6火焰伤害。

Smoke Vision.description: 烟不会削弱伏藏龙的视觉；他们忽视由烟带来的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Yzobu.name: Yzobu
Yzobu.publicNotes:
Yzobus are herd beasts common across northern plains and mountains, resembling a cross between a steer, a sturdy horse, and a yak. They most notably feature a pungent stench caused by bodily secretions building up within their thick, shaggy pelts-a stench so strong that yzobu herds can often be smelled before they appear. Territorial and aggressive, yzobus often attack other creatures on sight. When threatened, a herd launches into a stampede, trampling any in their path and goring survivors with their distinctive horns.

Some ranchers trade yzobu hides as a workable leather for mercenaries and guards, but the powerful smell means that most ranchers tend their small herds on the outskirts of towns. Typically, yzobus aren't raised to a specific age, but rather are killed whenever one escapes and poses a threat. The hides require an intensive tanning process with almost constant brushing and hours soaking in salt water-but the effort results in a leather both soft to the touch and sturdy enough to work as an effective armor for several years.

Hides aren't the only yzobu products worth harvesting. A female yzobu's milk is rich and nutrient-rich, making it a staple food source in some regions. Their meat is less enticing but still edible.

These beasts remain a permanent part of hobgoblin society, where their aggressive temperaments and durable, sturdy bodies are great assets. Hobgoblins possess an immunity to yzobu stench, and they view the fact that other races sickened by it as further evidence of their own superiority. They also highly prize yzobu mounts, and hobgoblin commanders often paint their yzobu's horns in varying colors and patterns to show how many enemies the mount has killed. Yzobu cavalry are a staple of hobgoblin military action, and they played a key role in the recent Ironfang Invasion that led to the formation of the new hobgoblin nation of Oprak in Avistan. The establishment of Oprak meant that many Avistani who had never encountered yzobus before have grown familiar-if not enchanted-with their distinctive odor。

Pungent Aura.name: Pungent Aura
Pungent Aura.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Creatures other than yzobus or hobgoblins that enter or start their turn in the yzobu's aura must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:14] save or become@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2} on a critical failure. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1minute。

Zetogeki.name: Zetogeki
Zetogeki.publicNotes:
Basalt comprises the earthen bodies of zetogekis, giant lizards with an innate ability to absorb and redirect kinetic energy. They dwell near active volcanos, particularly at hot springs and geysers, from which they drink copious quantities of steaming, mineral-rich water. Since they have no need for any other sustenance (and in fact can't digest anything else), zetogekis guard these watering holes. The worst fate that can befall the proprietor of a mountain hot spring is the arrival of a zetogeki, which can transform a lucrative business into a public hazard overnight. Mountain dwellers who make use of such hot springs pay monster hunters handsomely to eradicate or chase off zetogekis, but dealing with the stubborn beasts is no mean feat.

Even in wilder lands, zetogekis prove menacing to mountaineers. The lizards sometimes purposefully throw themselves down mountainsides to absorb the kinetic energy dealt to them during their tumble. They use this accumulated energy to take down predators-though zetogekis see nearly every other type of creature as a predator.

This marvelous ability to absorb and dole out physical energy come from a zetogeki's unique configuration of shale-like scales, which it can angle at will much like a porcupine extending its quills. Those who encounter a zetogeki hunkered down with its scales in the telltale raised pattern of zig-zagging black and gold would do well to give the lizard a wide berth. This danger has its upsides, however; some alchemists and wizards offer substantial bounties for intact zetogeki hides。

Mangle.name: Mangle
Mangle.description:
需求 The zetogeki has a creature grabbed in its jaws

效果 The zetogeki mangles the grabbed creature and slams it about, dealing [[/r (3d8)[bludgeoning]]]{3d8钝击伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:26|basic:true]豁免)。

Tilt Scales.name: Tilt Scales
Tilt Scales.description: The zetogeki shifts the scales that cover its body to better absorb kinetic energy from physical blows. The zetogeki gains resistance 10 to physical damage, but its Speeds are reduced to 10 feet. If the zetogeki gets hit for 20 or more physical damage in a single blow while its scales are tilted (before applying resistance), it stores the kinetic energy of the blow. The zetogeki can realign its scales to their regular position by taking this action again. When it does, it channels any stored kinetic energy into the next Strike it makes before the end of its turn. If the Strike hits, it deals an additional [[/r 2d8]] damage. The energy is expended whether or not the Strike hits。

Zombie Dragon.name: 丧尸龙 Zombie Dragon
Zombie Dragon.publicNotes:
死灵法师们经常创造此类无心智的亡来作为其顺从而可消耗的仆人。如果任其自生自灭，丧尸只会吞噬活物，直至它腐烂的身躯再无法维持其形。

曾经伟岸巨龙的腐烂躯壳，这只憎恶失去了往昔的辉煌，但其凶恶不减当年。它那因腐烂而千疮百孔的翅膀无法提供使它翱翔的升力，但唤起它的邪恶死灵能量仍让它能缓慢地飞行。

DY5764x6bU3jfnwu.name: 缓慢 Slow
DY5764x6bU3jfnwu.description: 丧尸龙永久具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}且无法使用反应动作。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
丧尸龙吐出一股恶臭的内脏，造成[[/r (5d6)[bludgeoning]]]{5d6钝击伤害}和[[/r (5d6)[poison]]]{5d6毒素伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免）。豁免骰大失败的生物额外获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

丧尸龙在接下来的[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法使用它的吐息。

Zuishin.name: 隋神 Zuishin
Zuishin.publicNotes:
隋神是负责看守重要神庙，远古大门，或宗教门径的神灵武士和射手。藏在复雪山谷中的庙宇，隐蔽在偏僻山林的宝塔，记录着通往神圣的隐藏都市道路的拱门，都可能容纳这样的神灵。穿着坚固的铠甲，手持神圣的武器，隋神不休止地战斗以驱赶意图亵渎他们之护的邪恶力量。在所有神灵中，隋神是最常与鬼作战的，只因隋神守卫的护也是这些卑鄙魔族最常亵渎的目标。

大多数隋神都穿着古老的盔甲，使用着例如剑与弓这样的强大武器，但是有些也可能会使用矛，斧，或只使用他们自己的拳头，这取决于他们的护和人们提供何种祭品。隋神倾向于以怀疑的态度对待凡人。为了取得隋神的信任，请求者可能会献上具有重要意义的自然物品，比如一瓮神圣的土，一根古树的枝条，或一簇当地的花卉。

和所有神灵一样，隋神可能会会对人类和其同族保持矜持甚至漠不关心；而这种态度只是因为隋神的智慧和悠久寿命，这让凡人事务在他们眼里显得微不足道。而对于其他神灵，他们又是绝对仁慈且乐于帮助的。例如，一个护处于古老森林中的隋神会很乐意与树中的木灵神联手御敌。

神灵是生于内海地区遥远东方，天夏之地的神性自然生物。他们守护着自然物体和地点——既他们的“护”（wards）——同时亦是鬼（Oni，见《Pathfinder Bestiary 2》）的远古死敌。神灵可以与他们的护融合，让他们暗中监视任何踏入其神圣之地者。神灵不会管那些他们认为的无害之人，但这些魂魄会警惕地战斗以吓跑任何被认为是威胁之人。神灵会选择自己的护，因此凡人会试图吸引他们到需要保护的所在，例如一大片特定的树，雕像，门以及其他神灵广为人知会住进去的象征元素。

Ward.name: 护 Ward
Ward.description:
每个神灵都与一个护绑定：一个特定的动物，植物，物品或地点。一个神灵可以用一个具有专注特征的动作与他们的护融合或脱出。融合时，神灵可以用他们的常规感官也可以用护的感官来观察周围，但是不能移动，与护交流，或控制他们的护。此外，融合进护中的神灵每分钟完全恢复其HP如同他们花了一整天休息。

隋神的护是一处特定的大门，门径，神庙。

Healing Arrow.name: 治疗箭 Healing Arrow
Healing Arrow.description:
隋神给一支箭示以治疗魔法，并对一名盟友进行一次复合长弓打击。如果命中，不会造成伤害，取而代之地是箭会释加如下隋神的神术内在法术之一：@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Hnc7eGi7vyZenAIm]{生命之息 Breath of Life}，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{移除疾病 Remove Disease}，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.BCuHKrDeJ4eq53M6]{移除麻痹 Remove Paralysis}。隋神必须有可用的法术，使用这种能力会消耗法术。

如果隋神在对盟友的攻击骰上失败但又想要命中，那此次攻击命中，但是如果骰出大失败，那么它仍然会未命中。

Holy Weaponry.name: 神圣武器 Holy Weaponry
Holy Weaponry.description: 隋神握住的任何武器都将变为强击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{神圣}武器。隋神在使用任何弓攻击时都能凭空创造箭矢。
